content: I am a man of fixed and unbending principles, the first of which is to be flexible at all times.
content_cn: 我是个原则坚定不屈的人，首要原则就是随时保持灵活。

author: Helen Keller
content: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen, nor touched... but are felt in the heart.
content_cn: 世间至善至美之物，不可见，不可触……只可心感。

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: If you must tell me your opinions, tell me what you believe in. I have plenty of doubts of my own.
content_cn: 若非要向我陈述观点，请告诉我你的信念。我自有诸多疑惑。

author: Melody Beattie
content: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
content_cn: 感恩为往昔赋予意义，为今朝带来安宁，为明日创造愿景。

author: Ovid
content: The cause is hidden. The effect is visible to all.
content_cn: 因不可见，果昭于众。

author: Pema Chödrön
content: The greatest obstacle to connecting with our joy is resentment.
content_cn: 联结喜悦的最大障碍，是怨恨。

author: Rabindranath Tagore
content: We read the world wrong and say that it deceives us.
content_cn: 我们误读了世界，反说世界欺骗了我们。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Each man has his own vocation; his talent is his call. There is one direction in which all space is open to him.
content_cn: 人人皆有天职；其才即其召。总有一个方向，向他敞开全部天地。

author: Robert M. Pirsig
content: The place to improve the world is first in one's own heart and head and hands.
content_cn: 改善世界，当始于己心、己思、己行。

author: Tony Robbins
content: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
content_cn: 命运铸就于决断瞬间。

author: Winston Churchill
content: I never worry about action, but only inaction.
content_cn: 我从不忧虑行动，只忧无动于衷。

author: Zig Ziglar
content: You are the only person on earth who can use your ability.
content_cn: 你是世上唯一能运用自己才能的人。

author: Confucius
content: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.
content_cn: 获智有三途：思辨最高贵，模仿最便捷，体悟最苦涩。

author: Ludwig van Beethoven
content: Music is a higher revelation than all wisdom and philosophy.
content_cn: 音乐是比一切智慧哲学更高的启示。

author: Euripides
content: Along with success comes a reputation for wisdom.
content_cn: 成功总伴智慧之名。

author: Thomas Fuller
content: If you have one true friend, you have more than your share.
content_cn: 若得一知己，已是命运厚赐。

author: William Butler Yeats
content: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met.
content_cn: 此处无陌生人，唯有你尚未结识的朋友。

author: Samuel Richardson
content: Marriage is the highest state of friendship. If happy, it lessens our cares by dividing them, at the same time that it doubles our pleasures by mutual participation.
content_cn: 婚姻是友谊的最高形态。若美满，既能分担烦忧减其重，又可共享欢愉增其倍。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature.
content_cn: 朋友堪称自然的杰作。

author: Mignon McLaughlin
content: It is important to our friends to believe that we are unreservedly frank with them, and important to friendship that we are not.
content_cn: 朋友总希望我们毫无保留，而友谊的真谛恰在于我们并未如此。

author: Woody Allen
content: I don't want to achieve immortality through my work... I want to achieve it through not dying.
content_cn: 我不想通过作品获得不朽...我想通过不死来达成。

author: Woody Allen
content: I was thrown out of college for cheating on the metaphysics exam; I looked into the soul of the boy sitting next to me.
content_cn: 我因在形而上学考试中作弊被开除——我偷看了邻座男孩的灵魂。

author: Agatha Christie
content: Good advice is always certain to be ignored, but that's no reason not to give it.
content_cn: 良言总被忽视，但这绝非止言之由。

author: Anaïs Nin
content: There is not one big cosmic meaning for all, there is only the meaning we each give to our life.
content_cn: 世间并无普适的宏大意义，唯有我们各自赋予人生的意义。

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
content_cn: 告之则忘，教之则记，践之则悟。

author: Blaise Pascal
content: Man is equally incapable of seeing the nothingness from which he emerges and the infinity in which he is engulfed.
content_cn: 人类既无力看清自己来自的虚无，也无法理解身陷的无限。

author: Buckminster Fuller
content: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
content_cn: 毛虫身上没有任何迹象表明它将化蝶

author: Helen Keller
content: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
content_cn: 世间至美之物，非目所能视，非手所能触，唯以心感之

author: Jim Rohn
content: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
content_cn: 若不规划自己的人生，终将落入他人计划。猜他们为你计划了什么？寥寥无几

author: John F. Kennedy
content: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
content_cn: 敢惨败者，方有大成

author: Laozi
content: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.
content_cn: 成长之要，在于将更高维度的意识引入觉知

author: Mary Kay Ash
content: Aerodynamically the bumblebee shouldn't be able to fly, but the bumblebee doesn't know that, so it goes on flying anyway.
content_cn: 按空气动力学，大黄蜂本不能飞，但它不知此理，故照飞不误

author: Michelangelo
content: The greatest danger for most of us is not that our aim is too high, and we miss it, but that it is too low, and we reach it.
content_cn: 对多数人而言，最大危险不在目标过高而未达，而在目标过低竟达成

author: Oprah Winfrey
content: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
content_cn: 众人愿与你同乘豪车，但你需要的，是豪车抛锚时愿陪你搭公交之人

author: Pablo Picasso
content: I begin with an idea and then it becomes something else.
content_cn: 我始于一个想法，而后它蜕变成他物

author: Richard Bach
content: Happiness is the reward we get for living to the highest right we know.
content_cn: 幸福是我们践行所知最高真理的奖赏

author: Sophocles
content: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.
content_cn: 智慧乃幸福至高要素

author: Voltaire
content: Think for yourselves and let others enjoy the privilege to do so too.
content_cn: 为自己思考，也让他人享有此特权

author: Wayne Dyer
content: I cannot always control what goes on outside. But I can always control what goes on inside.
content_cn: 外物非总能掌控，内心却始终可主

author: Robert Schuller
content: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
content_cn: 宁求伟大而败，不求无为而成

author: Daniel J. Boorstin
content: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge.
content_cn: 发现之最大障碍，非无知，乃知识之幻象

author: John Burroughs
content: Wisdom cannot come by railroad or automobile or airplane or be hurried up by telegraph or telephone.
content_cn: 智慧非火车汽车飞机能载，亦非电报电话可速达

author: Mark Goulston
content: Know what's important and what isn't. Have the wisdom to know the right thing to do, the integrity to do it, the character to stand up to those who don't, and the courage to stop those who won't.
content_cn: 明辨轻重。智以知正道，诚以行之，勇以抗违者，毅以阻拒者

author: Leonard Nimoy
content: Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.
content_cn: 逻辑乃智慧之始，非其终

author: Simone de Beauvoir
content: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, indignation and compassion.
content_cn: 当人以爱、友谊、义愤与同情赋予他人生命价值时，其生命自有价值

author: Albert Schweitzer
content: Constant kindness can accomplish much. As the sun makes ice melt, kindness causes misunderstanding, mistrust, and hostility to evaporate.
content_cn: 恒常善意成大事。如阳光融冰，善意使误解、猜疑与敌意蒸发

author: Anne Frank
content: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
content_cn: 妙哉！世人皆可即刻着手改善世界

author: The Buddha
content: Heedfulness is the path to the Deathless. Heedlessness is the path to death. The heedful die not. The heedless are as if already dead.
content_cn: 正念通向不死，放逸通向死亡。正念者不死，放逸者如尸

author: Confucius
content: To study and not think is a waste. To think and not study is dangerous.
content_cn: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆

author: Denis Waitley
content: The only person who never makes mistakes is the person who never does anything.
content_cn: 唯一不犯错者，乃无所作为之人

author: Elbert Hubbard
content: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
content_cn: 人生最大错误，就是持续恐惧犯错

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
content_cn: 未来属于相信梦想之美者

author: Grandma Moses
content: Life is what you make of it. Always has been, always will be.
content_cn: 生命由你塑造，亘古如此，永世不变

author: Laozi
content: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
content_cn: 吾有三宝，持而保之：一曰慈，二曰俭，三曰不敢为天下先

author: Nikola Tesla
content: Our virtues and our failings are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.
content_cn: 人之优点与缺点如力与物不可分，分离之时，人将不存

author: Pablo Picasso
content: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
content_cn: 我总做不会之事，为求学会如何做

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
content_cn: 老友之福，在于你可放心在他们面前犯傻

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
content_cn: 幸福如香水，洒向他人时，自己亦沾数滴

author: Sigmund Freud
content: The most complicated achievements of thought are possible without the assistance of consciousness.
content_cn: 最复杂的思想成就，无需意识协助亦可达成

author: Walt Disney
content: If you can dream it, you can do it.
content_cn: 心有所梦，行必能成

author: Walter Benjamin
content: To be happy is to be able to become aware of oneself without fright.
content_cn: 幸福，是能够不带恐惧地觉知自我

author: Walter Lippmann
content: Ideals are an imaginative understanding of that which is desirable in that which is possible.
content_cn: 理想是对可能之事中可取部分的想象性理解

author: Wayne Dyer
content: You are important enough to ask and you are blessed enough to receive back.
content_cn: 你足够重要故可请求，亦足够有福故得回应

author: Winston Churchill
content: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
content_cn: 取之谋生，予之成命

author: Bernard Shaw
content: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
content_cn: 使人智慧的，非对过去的回忆，乃对未来的责任

author: Kahlil Gibran
content: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
content_cn: 愿友谊的甘甜中有欢笑与喜乐共享。因心灵在琐事的晨露中寻得朝气与清新

author: Muhammad Ali
content: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
content_cn: 友谊...非在校可学。但若未悟友谊真谛，实乃一无所学

author: Anton Chekhov
content: Love, friendship and respect do not unite people as much as a common hatred for something.
content_cn: 爱、友谊与尊敬使人联合的程度，不及共同仇恨某物

author: Virginia Woolf
content: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.
content_cn: 有人寻牧师，有人觅诗歌，我则找朋友

author: Abraham Lincoln
content: Truth is generally the best vindication against slander.
content_cn: 真相通常是对诽谤的最佳辩白

author: Anatole France
content: To accomplish great things, we must dream as well as act.
content_cn: 成大事者，须梦行并举

author: Anne Frank
content: No one has ever become poor by giving.
content_cn: 施予者永不会贫穷

author: Carl Jung
content: Without this playing with fantasy no creative work has ever yet come to birth. The debt we owe to the play of the imagination is incalculable.
content_cn: 无幻想游戏，则无创意之作诞生。我们欠想象力游戏的债无法估量

author: Charles Du Bos
content: The important thing is this: to be able at any moment to sacrifice what we are for what we could become.
content_cn: 要义在此：能随时牺牲当下之我，成就未来之我

author: Confucius
content: Reviewing what you have learned and learning anew, you are fit to be a teacher.
content_cn: 温故而知新，可以为师矣

author: Eckhart Tolle
content: The past has no power to stop you from being present now. Only your grievance about the past can do that.
content_cn: 过去无力阻碍你活在当下，唯你对过去的怨念可以

author: Gloria Steinem
content: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
content_cn: 若缺乏想象力的飞跃或梦想，我们将失去可能性的激情。毕竟，梦想本就是规划的一种形式。

author: Helen Keller
content: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world right in the eye.
content_cn: 永远不要低头。始终昂首挺胸，直视这世界。

author: Heraclitus
content: You cannot step twice into the same river, for other waters are continually flowing in.
content_cn: 人不能两次踏入同一条河流，因为新的水不断流过。

author: Jack Buck
content: Things turn out best for those who make the best of the way things turn out.
content_cn: 善处逆境者，终得善果。

author: Jean-Paul Sartre
content: Man is not sum of what he has already, but rather the sum of what he does not yet have, of what he could have.
content_cn: 人不是他已拥有的总和，而是他尚未拥有、可能拥有的总和。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Everything that happens as it should, and if you observe carefully, you will find this to be so.
content_cn: 万物皆应其所是，细察便知。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth.
content_cn: 所闻皆观点，非事实；所见皆视角，非真相。

author: Mark Twain
content: A thing long expected takes the form of the unexpected when at last it comes.
content_cn: 期待已久之事，最终到来时却以意外的形式呈现。

author: Mark Twain
content: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
content_cn: 二十年后，让你失望的不是做过的事，而是没做过的事。

author: Publilius Syrus
content: Better be ignorant of a matter than half know it.
content_cn: 宁可全然不知，切勿一知半解。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Our lives are a sum total of the choices we have made.
content_cn: 生命即是我们所有选择的总和。

author: Whoopi Goldberg
content: Were here for a reason. I believe a bit of the reason is to throw little torches out to lead people through the dark.
content_cn: 我们存在自有其意义。我相信部分意义在于抛出小小火把，引领人们穿越黑暗。

author: William Penn
content: True silence is the rest of the mind; it is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
content_cn: 真正的沉默是心灵的休憩，对精神而言犹如睡眠之于身体，是滋养与更新。

author: Robert Schuller
content: Spectacular achievement is always preceded by unspectacular preparation.
content_cn: 非凡成就总源于平凡的积累。

author: Isaac Asimov
content: The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom.
content_cn: 当今生活最悲哀之处，莫过于科学获取知识的速度远超社会积累智慧的速度。

author: Albert Einstein
content: The attempt to combine wisdom and power has only rarely been successful and then only for a short while.
content_cn: 将智慧与权力结合的尝试鲜有成功，即便成功也仅昙花一现。

author: Baltasar Gracián
content: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.
content_cn: 真正的友谊使人生之喜乐倍增，使苦难减半。当努力结交朋友，因无友的人生犹如荒岛独居...得一生知己已是幸事，能长相厮守更是天赐。

author: George Herbert
content: Read as you taste fruit or savor wine, or enjoy friendship, love or life.
content_cn: 读书当如品尝鲜果、细酌美酒，亦如享受友谊、爱情或生活。

author: Abraham Lincoln
content: I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends.
content_cn: 化敌为友，便是消灭敌人。

author: Anne Bradstreet
content: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant; if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
content_cn: 若无严冬，春色怎会如此怡人；若不历经逆境，顺境又怎会这般珍贵。

author: The Buddha
content: All phenomena are preceded by the mind, created by the mind, and have the mind as their master.
content_cn: 万法心先导，心造作，心为主。

author: The Buddha
content: Do I speak at the right time, or not? Do I speak of facts, or not? Do I speak gently or harshly? Do I speak profitable words or not? Do I speak with a kindly heart, or inwardly malicious?
content_cn: 我是否适时而言？所言是否如实？语气是温和还是粗厉？所说是否有益？是心怀慈悲，还是内藏恶意？

author: Carl Jung
content: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams, who looks inside, awakes.
content_cn: 唯有审视内心，视野方得清明。向外张望者做梦，内观自照者觉醒。

author: Confucius
content: The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.
content_cn: 知己愈深，自恕愈多。

author: Confucius
content: The superior man is modest in his speech but exceeds in his actions.
content_cn: 君子欲讷于言而敏于行。

author: Confucius
content: When you meet someone better than yourself, turn your thoughts to becoming his equal. When you meet someone not as good as you are, look within and examine your own self.
content_cn: 见贤思齐焉，见不贤而内自省也。

author: Henry K. Beecher
content: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
content_cn: 感恩是灵魂绽放的最美花朵。

author: Henry Miller
content: The moment one gives close attention to anything, even a blade of grass, it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself.
content_cn: 当人全神贯注于某物，哪怕一叶小草，它也会自成神秘、可畏、难以言喻的壮丽世界。

author: Lewis Cass
content: People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.
content_cn: 人们或许怀疑你的言语，但会相信你的行动。

author: Marsha Petrie Sue
content: Stay away from what might have been and look at what will be.
content_cn: 莫纠结于本可能如何，应关注将如何。

author: Pema Chödrön
content: If we learn to open our hearts, anyone, including the people who drive us crazy, can be our teacher.
content_cn: 若学会敞开心扉，任何人，包括那些让我们抓狂的人，都能成为我们的老师。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: The world makes way for the man who knows where he is going.
content_cn: 世界会给明确方向的人让路。

author: Richard Bach
content: Learning is finding out what you already know.
content_cn: 学习就是发现你已知的东西。

author: Sophocles
content: Much wisdom often goes with fewer words.
content_cn: 大智常寡言。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Simply put, you believer that things or people make you unhappy, but this is not accurate. You make yourself unhappy.
content_cn: 简言之，你以为外物或他人令你不快，实则不然，是你在让自己不快。

author: Will Rogers
content: If you find yourself in a hole, the first thing to do is stop digging.
content_cn: 若发现自己身处坑中，首要之事就是停止挖掘。

author: Yogi Berra
content: You can observe a lot just by watching.
content_cn: 仅靠观察就能发现很多。

author: Simone Weil
content: I can, therefore I am.
content_cn: 我能，故我在。

author: Francis of Assisi
content: Pure, holy simplicity confounds all the wisdom of this world and the wisdom of the flesh.
content_cn: 纯净神圣的单纯，胜过世间一切智慧与肉体的聪明。

author: Volker Grassmuck
content: The ultimate promise of technology is to make us master of a world that we command by the push of a button.
content_cn: 技术的终极承诺，是让我们通过按钮的轻触成为世界的主宰。

author: Walter Winchell
content: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
content_cn: 真正的朋友，是在全世界都离你而去时走进来的人。

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
content_cn: 爱情是盲目的，友谊则闭上眼睛。

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: Friendship with oneself is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.
content_cn: 与自己的友谊至关重要，因为若不能与自己为友，便无法与世上任何人交友。

author: Seneca the Younger
content: Friendship always benefits; love sometimes injures.
content_cn: 友谊总有益，爱情时有伤。

author: Woody Allen
content: How is it possible to find meaning in a finite world, given my waist and shirt size?
content_cn: 以我的腰围和衬衫尺码，如何在有限的世界里寻找意义？

author: Abraham Lincoln
content: Important principles may, and must, be inflexible.
content_cn: 重要原则可以且必须坚定不移。

author: Aristotle
content: Criticism is something you can easily avoid by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
content_cn: 批评很容易避免——只要不言、不行、不为。

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
content_cn: 人生成功的一个秘诀是：当机会来临时，你已准备就绪。

author: Bruce Lee
content: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
content_cn: 若你热爱生命，就别浪费时间，因为生命正是由时间构成。

author: The Buddha
content: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
content_cn: 无怨念者，必得安宁。

author: The Buddha
content: Meditation brings wisdom, lack of meditation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what holds you back and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
content_cn: 禅定生慧，无定生痴。明辨进退之道，择智慧之路而行。

author: William Ellery Channing
content: Error is discipline through which we advance.
content_cn: 错误乃促人精进之戒律。

author: Epictetus
content: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
content_cn: 重要的不是遭遇何事，而是如何应对。

author: Henry Moore
content: There is no retirement for an artist, it's your way of living so there is no end to it.
content_cn: 艺术家永不退休，此乃生活方式，故无终期。

author: John Dryden
content: Fortune befriends the bold.
content_cn: 命运眷勇者。

author: Maureen Dowd
content: The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.
content_cn: 当你妥协于次等选择，所得将比妥协的更少。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Opportunity often comes disguised in the form of misfortune, or temporary defeat.
content_cn: 机遇常伪装成不幸或暂时失败而来。

author: Nelson Mandela
content: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
content_cn: 教育是改变世界最有力的武器。

author: Pablo Picasso
content: He can who thinks he can, and he can't who thinks he can't. This is an inexorable, indisputable law.
content_cn: 信其能者则能，疑其能者则不能。此乃无可辩驳之铁律。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
content_cn: 自信乃成功第一秘诀。

author: Richard Bach
content: Argue for your limitations, and sure enough they're yours.
content_cn: 若为自身局限辩护，则局限永属你所有。

author: Richard Bach
content: In order to win, you must expect to win.
content_cn: 欲胜者，必先怀必胜之念。

author: Richard Bach
content: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
content_cn: 倾听所知，而非所惧。

author: Satchel Paige
content: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
content_cn: 工作如不需报酬，去爱如未曾受伤，起舞如无人观望。

author: Thích Nhất Hạnh
content: There is no way to happiness, happiness is the way.
content_cn: 幸福非终点，幸福即道路。

author: Winston Churchill
content: Success is not final; failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
content_cn: 成功非终点，失败非终结；唯持续前行之勇气最可贵。

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
content: Most of our pocket wisdom is conceived for the use of mediocre people, to discourage them from ambitious attempts, and generally console them in their mediocrity.
content_cn: 多数处世箴言皆为平庸者设计，劝阻其雄心，安抚其平凡。
author_cn: 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森

author: Henry Ward Beecher
content: It is one of the severest tests of friendship to tell your friend his faults. So to love a man that you cannot bear to see a stain upon him, and to speak painful truth through loving words, that is friendship.
content_cn: 诤友之过乃友谊最严苛考验。爱之深而不忍见其瑕，以爱语道痛切真言，方为挚友。

author: Albert Einstein
content: If A is success in life, then A equals x plus y plus z. Work is x; y is play; and z is keeping your mouth shut.
content_cn: 若A代表人生成功，则A=x+y+z：x是工作，y是娱乐，z是缄默。

author: Amy Bloom
content: Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
content_cn: 一见钟情易解，相看两不厌终生，方为奇迹。

author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
content: I know but one freedom and that is the freedom of the mind.
content_cn: 吾所知唯一自由，乃思想之自由。
author_cn: 安托万·德·圣-埃克苏佩里

author: Carl Jung
content: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
content_cn: 适彼之履，或伤此足；生活之道，从无万全之策。

author: Camillo Benso, Count of Cavour
content: The man who trusts men will make fewer mistakes than he who distrusts them.
content_cn: 信人者比疑人者少犯错。

author: Franz Liszt
content: Beware of missing chances; otherwise it may be altogether too late someday.
content_cn: 慎勿错失良机，免致追悔莫及。

author: Laozi
content: Be the chief but never the lord.
content_cn: 为百谷王而不为主。

author: Laozi
content: To see things in the seed, that is genius.
content_cn: 见微知著，是为天才。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: There is nothing happens to any person but what was in his power to go through with.
content_cn: 人所遭遇，皆其力所能堪。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: You can do it if you believe you can!
content_cn: 信则能成！

author: Richard Bach
content: Ask yourself the secret of your success. Listen to your answer and practice it.
content_cn: 自问成功秘诀，倾听内心答案，然后践行。

author: Socrates
content: Be as you wish to seem.
content_cn: 行如汝愿显于世。

author: Thích Nhất Hạnh
content: Smile, breathe and go slowly.
content_cn: 微笑，呼吸，从容前行。

author: Tony Robbins
content: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
content_cn: 成功者善问，故得妙解。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
content_cn: 从事所爱，乃人生丰盛之基石。

author: Dr. Seuss
content: Step with care and great tact and remember that Life's a Great Balancing Act.
content_cn: 慎步巧行，须知人生乃伟大平衡术。

author: John McCain
content: Our shared values define us more than our differences. And acknowledging those shared values can see us through our challenges today if we have the wisdom to trust in them again.
content_cn: 共同价值比分歧更能定义我们。若能以智慧重拾这些价值认同，便可助我们度过当下挑战。

author: Edmund Burke
content: But what is liberty without wisdom, and without virtue? It is the greatest of all possible evils; for it is folly, vice, and madness, without tuition or restraint.
content_cn: 无智慧无美德之自由乃万恶之首，因那是无教导无约束的愚行、恶习与疯狂。

author: John Burroughs
content: The lure of the distant and the difficult is deceptive. The great opportunity is where you are.
content_cn: 远方与艰险之诱实乃虚妄。伟大机遇就在当下所处。

author: P. Chidambaram
content: All wisdom does not reside in Delhi.
content_cn: 智慧非尽聚德里。

author: Simon Mainwaring
content: Technology is teaching us to be human again.
content_cn: 科技正教会我们重归人性。

author: Mother Angelica
content: Two of man's basic needs are to love and to share. Both of these needs are satisfied in greater or lesser degree by friendship.
content_cn: 爱与被爱乃人之基本需求，二者皆可通过友谊得到不同程度的满足。

author: Ralph Abernathy
content: The industrial landscape is already littered with remains of once successful companies that could not adapt their strategic vision to altered conditions of competition.
content_cn: 商界已遍布昔日成功企业的残骸，它们皆因未能调整战略视野以适应竞争环境变化。

author: Anne Frank
content: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands.
content_cn: 父母仅能给予良导或引正途，而人格之最终塑造，仍操于己手。

author: Arthur Schopenhauer
content: Every man takes the limits of his own field of vision for the limits of the world.
content_cn: 世人常将自身视野之局限，误作世界之边界。

author: Daisaku Ikeda
content: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
content_cn: 今日若败，明日再胜。永不言弃的挑战精神，方为胜者之心。

author: Jimmy Dean
content: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
content_cn: 不能转风向，但可调帆向，终抵彼岸。

author: Joseph Campbell
content: Your sacred space is where you can find yourself again and again.
content_cn: 神圣空间乃你不断重遇真我之处。

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Where there is love there is life.
content_cn: 有爱之处即有生命。

author: Mark Twain
content: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
content_cn: 善意是聋者可闻、盲者可见的语言。

author: Mark Twain
content: To get the full value of joy you must have someone to divide it with.
content_cn: 欲享喜乐之全味，需有人同品。

author: Mary Kay Ash
content: For every failure, there's an alternative course of action. You just have to find it. When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.
content_cn: 每次失败皆有替代方案，只需寻得。遇路障时，绕道而行。

author: Pablo Picasso
content: Action is the foundational key to all success.
content_cn: 行动是一切成功的基石。

author: Pablo Picasso
content: All children are artists. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
content_cn: 每个孩子都是艺术家，问题在于如何长大后仍保持艺术家的心。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Truth, and goodness, and beauty are but different faces of the same all.
content_cn: 真、善、美实为同一本体的不同面相。

author: Richard Bach
content: Bad things are not the worst things that can happen to us. Nothing is the worst thing that can happen to us!
content_cn: 坏事并非最糟，无所作为才是人生至恶。

author: Viktor Frankl
content: When we are no longer able to change a situation - we are challenged to change ourselves.
content_cn: 当无力改变处境时，我们正被召唤改变自己。

author: Rabindranath Tagore
content: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
content_cn: 仅凭伫立凝视，永远无法横渡海洋。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: The sum of wisdom is that time is never lost that is devoted to work.
content_cn: 智慧的真谛在于：倾注于工作的时间永不虚度。

author: Abraham Maslow
content: If you only have a hammer, you tend to see every problem as a nail.
content_cn: 当你只有锤子时，看什么都像钉子。

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.
content_cn: 挚友会彼此珍视希望，温柔以待对方的梦想。

author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
content: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree.
content_cn: 爱情似花，友谊如树。

author: George Foreman
content: Forgiveness is that subtle thread that binds both love and friendship. Without forgiveness, you may not even have a child one day.
content_cn: 宽恕是维系爱与友谊的细线。若无宽恕，终将孤独终老。

author: Voltaire
content: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.
content_cn: 友谊是灵魂的结合，而这种结合也可能解体。

author: Shirley MacLaine
content: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
content_cn: 恐惧让本该成为朋友的人形同陌路。

author: Montesquieu
content: Friendship is an arrangement by which we undertake to exchange small favors for big ones.
content_cn: 友谊是我们约定以小惠换大益的契约。

author: Albert Einstein
content: Anyone who doesn't take truth seriously in small matters cannot be trusted in large ones either.
content_cn: 在小事上不认真的人，大事也不值得信赖。

author: Anatole France
content: It is better to understand a little than to misunderstand a lot.
content_cn: 一知半解远胜于全然误解。

author: Bodhidharma
content: All know the way; few actually walk it.
content_cn: 众人皆知大道，然力行之人寥寥。

author: Confucius
content: I am not bothered by the fact that I am unknown. I am bothered when I do not know others.
content_cn: 不患人之不己知，患不知人也。

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
content: It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another. But above all, try something.
content_cn: 尝试方法乃常理，失败则坦然承认另寻他法。但最重要的是：必须行动。

author: Gloria Steinem
content: If the shoe doesn't fit, must we change the foot?
content_cn: 若鞋子不合脚，难道要削足适履？

author: Henry Miller
content: The moment one gives close attention to anything, it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself.
content_cn: 当全神贯注时，任何事物都会展现其神秘而壮丽的本质世界。

author: Joan Didion
content: To free us from the expectations of others, to give us back to ourselves... there lies the great, singular power of self-respect.
content_cn: 将我们从他人期待中解放，回归本真...这便是自尊的伟大力量。

author: Mary Pickford
content: If you have made mistakes, there is always another chance for you. You may have a fresh start any moment you choose.
content_cn: 犯错无妨，随时可重获新生。

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err.
content_cn: 若自由不包含犯错的权利，便不值得拥有。

author: Murray Gell-Mann
content: Think how hard physics would be if particles could think.
content_cn: 试想若粒子会思考，物理学该有多难。

author: Og Mandino
content: I seek constantly to improve my manners and graces, for they are the sugar to which all are attracted.
content_cn: 我不断精进礼仪修养，因这是吸引众人的蜜糖。

author: Og Mandino
content: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
content_cn: 若有足够决心，失败永难追及。

author: Sai Baba
content: All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter.
content_cn: 万行由心起，故心念为要。

author: Socrates
content: Wisdom begins in wonder.
content_cn: 智慧始于惊疑。

author: Victor Hugo
content: An invasion of armies can be resisted, but not an idea whose time has come.
content_cn: 军队入侵可抵抗，但顺应时势的思想不可阻挡。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
content_cn: 舞蹈的真谛不在抵达某处，而在享受每个舞步。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Maxim for life: You get treated in life the way you teach people to treat you.
content_cn: 人生箴言：他人待你的方式，正是你教会他们的方式。

author: William Shakespeare
content: Speak low, if you speak love.
content_cn: 诉说爱意时，请轻声细语。

author: Yoko Ono
content: Sometimes I am happy and sometimes not. I am, after all, a human being, you know. And I am glad that we are sometimes happy and sometimes not. You get your wisdom working by having different emotions.
content_cn: 有时欢欣有时愁，此乃人之常情。正因悲喜交替，智慧方得生长。

author: Will Rogers
content: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
content_cn: 即使方向正确，停滞不前也会被淘汰。

author: Cicero
content: The higher we are placed, the more humbly we should walk.
content_cn: 地位愈高，愈当谦逊行事。

author: Leonardo da Vinci
content: It's easier to resist at the beginning than at the end.
content_cn: 拒恶于初易，克终于末难。

author: Epicurus
content: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
content_cn: 真正助益我们的不是朋友的实际帮助，而是确信他们会相助的信心。

author: Michel de Montaigne
content: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
content_cn: 若存在美满婚姻，必因其更似友谊而非爱情。

author: Albert Einstein
content: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
content_cn: 我无特别才能，唯保持热切好奇。

author: Anaïs Nin
content: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
content_cn: 生命的广度与勇气成正比。

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other.
content_cn: 经验之学费高昂，然愚者别无学堂。

author: Carl Sagan
content: Imagination will often carry us to worlds that never were. But without it we go nowhere.
content_cn: 想象常带我们抵达未至之境，失去它则寸步难行。

author: Chuck Norris
content: A lot of people give up just before theyre about to make it. You know you never know when that next obstacle is going to be the last one.
content_cn: 多数人在成功前一刻放弃。须知你永远不知道下一个障碍是否是最后一个。

author: Eckhart Tolle
content: The greater part of human pain is unnecessary. It is self-created as long as the unobserved mind runs your life.
content_cn: 多数痛苦皆非必要，只要心灵不受观照，便会自造痛苦。

author: Edgar Allan Poe
content: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
content_cn: 白日做梦者能觉察夜梦者忽略的诸多真相。

author: Jack Dixon
content: If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.
content_cn: 执着结果则永难改变，专注改变自得成果。

author: Leonardo da Vinci
content: In rivers, the water that you touch is the last of what has passed and the first of that which comes; so with present time.
content_cn: 河水中你触及的，既是逝去的末流，也是未来的初潮；当下时光亦是如此。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Accept the things to which fate binds you and love the people with whom fate brings you together but do so with all your heart.
content_cn: 接受命运的安排，全心热爱命运带来的人。

author: Mark Twain
content: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
content_cn: 前进的秘诀就是开始行动。

author: Napoleon
content: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination.
content_cn: 至真智慧在于坚定决心。

author: Napoleon
content: Imagination rules the world.
content_cn: 想象力统治世界。

author: Napoleon
content: Take time to deliberate, but when the time for action has arrived, stop thinking and go in.
content_cn: 深思需时，然行动之时当机立断。

author: Norman Cousins
content: Never deny a diagnosis but do deny the negative verdict that may go with it.
content_cn: 勿否认诊断，但要拒绝随之而来的消极判决。

author: Tony Robbins
content: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals - that is, goals that do not inspire them.
content_cn: 人非懒惰，只是目标无力——无法激发热情的目标。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
content_cn: 评判他人时，你定义的其实是自己。

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
content: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
content_cn: 激励的艺术在于让人自愿去做你想让他们做的事。

author: Rose Kennedy
content: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
content_cn: 我不知老之将至，亦不识疲倦与失败。

author: Nelson Mandela
content: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
content_cn: 甘于平庸的生活毫无激情可言。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: We are wiser than we know.
content_cn: 我们比自己知道的更睿智。

author: Franz Kafka
content: Start with what is right rather than what is acceptable.
content_cn: 从正确之事开始，而非可接受之事。

author: Orson Welles
content: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
content_cn: 我们孤独地生，孤独地活，孤独地死。唯有爱与友谊能暂时创造不孤独的幻象。

author: Bruce Lee
content: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
content_cn: 爱似燃烧的友谊。初如烈焰夺目炽热，终似炭火深沉不灭。

author: Ovid
content: The essence of true friendship is to make allowance for another's little lapses.
content_cn: 真友谊的精髓在于包容对方的小过失。

author: Henry Adams
content: A friend in power is a friend lost.
content_cn: 掌权的朋友等于失去的朋友。

author: Woody Allen
content: I can't listen to that much Wagner. I start getting the urge to conquer Poland.
content_cn: 瓦格纳听多了，会让我想征服波兰。

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: Never apologize for showing feelings. When you do so, you apologize for the truth.
content_cn: 永远不要为流露真情道歉，那等于为真实致歉。

author: Cecil B. DeMille
content: The person who makes a success of living is the one who see his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly. That is dedication.
content_cn: 成功人生属于那些紧盯目标坚定不移的人，这就是专注。

author: Miguel de Cervantes
content: Be slow of tongue and quick of eye.
content_cn: 敏于观而慎于言。

author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman
content: The first duty of a human being is to assume the right functional relationship to society - more briefly, to find your real job, and do it.
content_cn: 人的首要职责是确立与社会的正确关系——简言之，找到真正使命并践行之。

author: E. E. Cummings
content: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
content_cn: 成长并成为真正的自己需要勇气。

author: Edgar Allan Poe
content: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
content_cn: 所见所感，无非梦中梦。

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
content_cn: 我们热爱生命，非因习惯生存，而因习惯热爱。

author: Man Ray
content: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just to realize them.
content_cn: 我从不追求记录梦想，只求实现它们。

author: Pericles
content: Time is the wisest counsellor of all.
content_cn: 时间是最睿智的顾问。

author: Stephen Covey
content: We are not animals. We are not a product of what has happened to us in our past. We have the power of choice.
content_cn: 我们不是动物，不是过去的产物，我们拥有选择的力量。

author: Winston Churchill
content: History will be kind to me for I intend to write it.
content_cn: 历史会善待我，因为我打算亲笔书写。

author: Norman Vincent Peale
content: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
content_cn: 相信自己！相信你的能力！没有谦逊而合理的自信，就无法成功或快乐。

author: George Herbert
content: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
content_cn: 切勿等待'完美时机'，立足当下，善用现有条件，更好的工具自会出现。

author: Plutarch
content: Silence at the proper season is wisdom, and better than any speech.
content_cn: 适时沉默是智慧，胜过任何言辞。

author: Phil Jackson
content: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.
content_cn: 智慧永远胜过蛮力。

author: Sigmund Freud
content: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
content_cn: 完全对自己诚实是极好的修炼。

author: John Keats
content: I will give you a definition of a proud man: he is a man who has neither vanity nor wisdom one filled with hatreds cannot be vain, neither can he be wise.
content_cn: 骄傲者的定义：既无虚荣亦无智慧。满怀仇恨者不可能虚荣，也不可能智慧。

author: Norman Cousins
content: Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences.
content_cn: 智慧在于预见结果。

author: Barbara Bush
content: Value your friendship. Value your relationships.
content_cn: 珍视友谊，珍视人际关系。

author: Amy Tan
content: I am like a falling star who has finally found her place next to another in a lovely constellation, where we will sparkle in the heavens forever.
content_cn: 我如流星终觅归宿，与另一颗星共组星座，永耀天穹。

author: The Buddha
content: Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
content_cn: 三事终难久藏：日月与真相。

author: Christopher Morley
content: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
content_cn: 成功只有一种——按自己的方式度过一生。

author: Dr. Seuss
content: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
content_cn: 当现实终于美过梦境而令你辗转难眠时，便是坠入爱河之时。

author: Epictetus
content: No man is free who is not master of himself.
content_cn: 不能主宰自我者，永无自由可言。

author: Hermann Hesse
content: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
content_cn: 若我懂得爱为何物，那都是因为你。

author: John Berry
content: The bird of paradise alights only upon the hand that does not grasp.
content_cn: 天堂鸟只栖于不握不抓的手掌。

author: John Lubbock
content: What we see depends mainly on what we look for.
content_cn: 所见取决于所寻。

author: Lin Yutang
content: I have done my best: that is about all the philosophy of living one needs.
content_cn: 我已尽力：这便是人生所需的全部哲学。

author: Pema Chödrön
content: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
content_cn: 全然活着、完全觉醒，就是不断被推出舒适区。

author: Richard Bach
content: Every problem has a gift for you in its hands.
content_cn: 每个问题手中都握着给你的礼物。

author: Samuel Beckett
content: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
content_cn: 尝试过，失败过，没关系。再尝试，再失败，更优雅地失败。

author: Francis of Assisi
content: Where there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
content_cn: 有仁爱智慧处，便无恐惧愚昧。

author: John Steinbeck
content: It is a common experience that a problem difficult at night is resolved in the morning after the committee of sleep has worked on it.
content_cn: 常见经验：夜间难题常在睡眠委员会处理后于清晨迎刃而解。

author: Francis Bacon
content: It is impossible to love and to be wise.
content_cn: 爱与智慧不可兼得。

author: Sidney Hook
content: Wisdom is a kind of knowledge. It is knowledge of the nature, career, and consequences of human values.
content_cn: 智慧是一种知识。它是对人类价值观的本质、发展和影响的认知。

author: Sydney J. Harris
content: The real danger is not that computers will begin to think like men, but that men will begin to think like computers.
content_cn: 真正的危险不在于计算机开始像人一样思考，而在于人开始像计算机一样思考。

author: Maria Shriver
content: When the world is so complicated, the simple gift of friendship is within all of our hands.
content_cn: 在这个如此复杂的世界里，友谊这份简单的礼物触手可及。

author: Elie Wiesel
content: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
content_cn: 友谊比爱情在生命中留下更深的印记。爱情有堕落为痴迷的风险，而友谊永远只是分享。

author: Albert Einstein
content: We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them.
content_cn: 我们无法用制造问题的思维方式来解决问题。

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: Ignorance never settles a question.
content_cn: 无知永远解决不了问题。

author: Bo Jackson
content: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
content_cn: 设定高远的目标，在达到之前决不停止。

author: Miguel de Cervantes
content: Those who will play with cats must expect to be scratched.
content_cn: 与猫嬉戏者，必须预料到被抓伤。

author: Chuck Swindoll
content: We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
content_cn: 我们都会面临一系列巧妙伪装成不可能情况的绝佳机会。

author: Confucius
content: Ability will never catch up with the demand for it.
content_cn: 才不逮需，永无止境。

author: Dorothy Thompson
content: Only when we are no longer afraid do we begin to live.
content_cn: 只有当我们不再恐惧时，我们才开始真正地生活。

author: Harriet Lerner
content: Only through our connectedness to others can we really know and enhance the self. And only through working on the self can we begin to enhance our connectedness to others.
content_cn: 只有通过与他人的联结，我们才能真正了解并提升自我。而只有通过自我修炼，我们才能增强与他人的联结。

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: The world is but a canvas to the imagination.
content_cn: 世界不过是想象力的画布。

author: Iris Murdoch
content: We can only learn to love by loving.
content_cn: 我们只能通过爱来学会爱。

author: Laozi
content: Great indeed is the sublimity of the Creative, to which all beings owe their beginning, and which permeates all heaven.
content_cn: 大哉乾元，万物资始，乃统天。

author: Laozi
content: He who knows, does not speak. He who speaks, does not know.
content_cn: 知者不言，言者不知。

author: Mother Teresa
content: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
content_cn: 无论走到哪里，都传播爱。不要让任何人在与你相处后不能变得更加快乐。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
content_cn: 如果你不能做伟大的事，那就以伟大的方式做小事。

author: Ovid
content: Let your hook always be cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish.
content_cn: 让你的鱼钩始终抛在水中；在你最不期待的水池里，可能就有鱼。

author: Philip Sidney
content: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
content_cn: 要么我找到一条路，要么我开辟一条路。

author: Socrates
content: The greatest way to live with honor in this world is to be what we pretend to be.
content_cn: 在这个世界上有尊严地生活的最好方式，是成为我们所假装成的那个人。

author: Sri Chinmoy
content: Judge nothing, you will be happy. Forgive everything, you will be happier. Love everything, you will be happiest.
content_cn: 不评判任何事，你会快乐。宽恕一切，你会更快乐。爱一切，你会最快乐。

author: Tony Robbins
content: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
content_cn: 你影响力的唯一限制是你的想象力和承诺。

author: Voltaire
content: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
content_cn: 雪崩时，没有一片雪花觉得自己有责任。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Our intention creates our reality.
content_cn: 我们的意图创造了我们的现实。

author: William James
content: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
content_cn: 做事就要像你所做的会有所改变。事实上，确实如此。

author: Oprah Winfrey
content: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.
content_cn: 去做你认为自己做不到的事。失败了没关系。再尝试。第二次做得更好。从不跌倒的人只有那些不敢攀登高处的人。这是属于你的时刻。把握它。

author: Confucius
content: There are three methods to gaining wisdom. The first is reflection, which is the highest. The second is limitation, which is the easiest. The third is experience, which is the bitterest.
content_cn: 获智有三途：思辨最上，效仿次易，体悟最苦。

author: Bertrand Russell
content: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
content_cn: 征服恐惧是智慧的开始。

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: There are three faithful friends - an old wife, an old dog, and ready money.
content_cn: 有三个忠实的朋友——结发妻子、忠诚的狗和随身的钱。

author: Arthur C. Clarke
content: Any sufficiently advanced technology is equivalent to magic.
content_cn: 任何足够先进的技术都与魔法无异。

author: Thomas Jefferson
content: Friendship is but another name for an alliance with the follies and the misfortunes of others. Our own share of miseries is sufficient: why enter then as volunteers into those of another?
content_cn: 友谊不过是与他人的愚行和不幸结盟的另一种称呼。我们自己的苦难已经足够：为何还要自愿加入他人的苦难中？

author: Aldous Huxley
content: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
content_cn: 在宇宙中只有一个角落你可以确定能够改善，那就是你自己。

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure.
content_cn: 通过坚持不懈，许多人从看似注定失败的事情中赢得了成功。

author: Calvin Coolidge
content: We cannot do everything at once, but we can do something at once.
content_cn: 我们不能一下子做所有的事，但我们可以立刻做一些事。

author: Zhuang Zhou
content: Flow with whatever is happening and let your mind be free. Stay centered by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.
content_cn: 随物而化，游心于淡。安时而处顺，是为至境。

author: Confucius
content: Silence is the true friend that never betrays.
content_cn: 静默不欺，是为真友。

author: Confucius
content: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
content_cn: 万物皆美，非人尽见。

author: Dalai Lama
content: More often than not, anger is actually an indication of weakness rather than of strength.
content_cn: 愤怒往往是软弱而非力量的表现。

author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
content: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
content_cn: 为明天做最好的准备就是今天尽力而为。

author: Helen Keller
content: No pessimist ever discovered the secrets of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new heaven to the human spirit.
content_cn: 悲观主义者从未发现星辰的秘密，也从未航行到未知的土地，或为人类精神开辟新的天地。

author: John Pierrakos
content: Life is movement-we breathe, we eat, we walk, we move!
content_cn: 生命就是运动——我们呼吸，我们吃饭，我们行走，我们活动！

author: Léon Blum
content: The free man is he who does not fear to go to the end of his thought.
content_cn: 自由人不惧怕将自己的思想贯彻到底。

author: Mark Twain
content: When in doubt, tell the truth.
content_cn: 当心存疑虑时，说出真相。

author: Mother Teresa
content: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
content_cn: 在小事上保持忠诚，因为你的力量就在其中。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Most great people have attained their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure.
content_cn: 大多数伟人取得最大成功的地方，恰好就是他们最大失败的一步之外。

author: Nora Roberts
content: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
content_cn: 如果你不去追求你想要的，你永远不会得到它。如果你不去问，答案永远是否定的。如果你不向前迈进，你将永远停留在原地。

author: Pablo Picasso
content: Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working.
content_cn: 灵感确实存在，但它必须在我们工作时才能找到我们。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: If the single man plant himself indomitably on his instincts, and there abide, the huge world will come round to him.
content_cn: 如果一个人坚定地立足于自己的本能，并且坚守不移，整个世界都会向他靠拢。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Imagination is not a talent of some men but is the health of every man.
content_cn: 想象力不是某些人的天赋，而是每个人的健康状态。

author: Thomas Carlyle
content: This world, after all our science and sciences, is still a miracle; wonderful, inscrutable, magical and more, to whosoever will think of it.
content_cn: 这个世界，尽管我们拥有各种科学，仍然是个奇迹；对任何愿意思考的人来说，它是奇妙的、不可思议的、神奇的，甚至更多。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: There is no way to prosperity, prosperity is the way.
content_cn: 通往繁荣的路并不存在，繁荣本身就是路。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: You can't choose up sides on a round world.
content_cn: 在一个圆形的世界上，你无法选边站。

author: Winston Churchill
content: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
content_cn: 持续的努力——而非力量或智力——是释放我们潜能的关键。

author: Michelangelo
content: The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low and achieving our mark.
content_cn: 对我们大多数人来说，最大的危险不在于目标定得太高而未达到，而在于目标定得太低且实现了。

author: Isocrates
content: I decided that it was not wisdom that enabled poets to write their poetry, but a kind of instinct or inspiration, such as you find in seers and prophets who deliver all their sublime messages without knowing in the least what they mean.
content_cn: 我认为使诗人写诗的并非智慧，而是一种本能或灵感，就像那些先知和预言家一样，他们传达崇高的信息，却丝毫不知其中含义。

author: Lord Byron
content: Sorrow is knowledge, those that know the most must mourn the deepest, the tree of knowledge is not the tree of life.
content_cn: 悲伤即知识，知道最多的人必须哀悼最深，知识之树并非生命之树。

author: Sophocles
content: Much wisdom often goes with fewest words.
content_cn: 最深的智慧常常以最少的言语表达。

author: Daniel Webster
content: Wisdom begins at the end.
content_cn: 智慧始于终点。

author: Kahlil Gibran
content: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
content_cn: 友谊永远是一种甜蜜的责任，而非机会。

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
content: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
content_cn: 朋友是你送给自己的礼物。
author_cn: 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森

author: Mao Zedong
content: The differences between friends cannot but reinforce their friendship.
content_cn: 朋友之间的差异只会加强他们的友谊。

author: Herman Melville
content: Friendship at first sight, like love at first sight, is said to be the only truth.
content_cn: 一见钟情的友谊，就像一见钟情的爱情，据说是唯一的真理。

author: Charles Péguy
content: Love is rarer than genius itself. And friendship is rarer than love.
content_cn: 爱比天才更稀有。而友谊比爱更稀有。

author: Samuel Butler
content: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
content_cn: 友谊如金钱，易得难守。

author: Baltasar Gracián
content: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit.
content_cn: 没有勇气，智慧不会结果。

author: Bruce Lee
content: To know oneself is to study oneself in action with another person.
content_cn: 了解自己就是研究自己与他人互动时的表现。

author: Carl Jung
content: In all chaos there is a cosmos, in all disorder a secret order.
content_cn: 所有混沌中都有一个宇宙，所有无序中都有一个隐秘的秩序。

author: Coco Chanel
content: There are people who have money and people who are rich.
content_cn: 有些人拥有金钱，有些人则真正富有。

author: Desmond Tutu
content: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
content_cn: 你不能选择你的家人。他们是上帝给你的礼物，正如你是给他们的礼物。

author: Edith Wharton
content: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
content_cn: 传播光明有两种方式：成为蜡烛或反射光明的镜子。

author: Hugh Miller
content: Problems are only opportunities with thorns on them.
content_cn: 问题只是带刺的机会。

author: Jane Roberts
content: By accepting yourself and being fully what you are, your presence can make others happy.
content_cn: 接受自己并完全做自己，你的存在就能使他人快乐。

author: John Muir
content: When one tugs at a single thing in nature, he finds it attached to the rest of the world.
content_cn: 当你拉动自然界的一物时，你会发现它与世界其余部分相连。

author: Leo Tolstoy
content: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
content_cn: 最强大的两个战士是耐心和时间。

author: Leonardo da Vinci
content: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
content_cn: 时间对任何善用它的人来说都足够长。

author: Louis Pasteur
content: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.
content_cn: 告汝吾成功之秘诀：吾力唯在坚韧不拔。

author: Mark Twain
content: The exercise of an extraordinary gift is the supremist pleasure in life.
content_cn: 施展非凡天赋，乃人生至乐。

author: Mother Teresa
content: Peace begins with a smile.
content_cn: 和平始于微笑。

author: Publilius Syrus
content: Do not turn back when you are just at the goal.
content_cn: 行百里者半九十。

author: Thích Nhất Hạnh
content: By living deeply in the present moment we can understand the past better and we can prepare for a better future.
content_cn: 深刻活在当下，既能更好理解过去，也能为更美好的未来做准备。

author: Tom Krause
content: There are no failures. Just experiences and your reactions to them.
content_cn: 世间无失败，唯有经历及你对其反应。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
content_cn: 或沉溺痛苦，或自我激励。无论如何，选择权在你。

author: Yogi Berra
content: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
content_cn: 生活即学习，唯学方知。

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.
content_cn: 智者须既能爱敌，亦能恨友。

author: Michel de Montaigne
content: The most certain sign of wisdom is cheerfulness.
content_cn: 智慧最确凿的标志是愉悦。

author: Theodore Roosevelt
content: Nine-tenths of wisdom is being wise in time.
content_cn: 智慧十之八九在于适时明智。

author: Samuel Johnson
content: Love is the wisdom of the fool and the folly of the wise.
content_cn: 爱是愚者之智，智者之愚。

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
content_cn: 不做绝望之事，乃智慧特征。

author: Thomas Jefferson
content: But friendship is precious, not only in the shade, but in the sunshine of life, and thanks to a benevolent arrangement the greater part of life is sunshine.
content_cn: 友谊珍贵，不仅在人生阴翳时，更在灿烂处。幸得上天仁慈安排，人生大半是晴天。

author: Woody Allen
content: Life is divided into the horrible and the miserable.
content_cn: 人生分为可怕与可悲两种。

author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
content: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking together in the same direction.
content_cn: 爱不在于彼此凝视，而在于朝同一方向眺望。
author_cn: 安托万·德·圣-埃克苏佩里

author: Aristotle
content: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
content_cn: 爱是同一个灵魂栖息在两个身体里。

author: Confucius
content: The Superior Man is aware of Righteousness, the inferior man is aware of advantage.
content_cn: 君子喻于义，小人喻于利。

author: Dhammapada
content: Just as a flower, which seems beautiful has color but no perfume, so are the fruitless words of a man who speaks them but does them not.
content_cn: 犹如色美无香之花，言而不行之语亦徒然。

author: George Eliot
content: What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?
content_cn: 若不为彼此减轻生活之艰，吾辈为何而生？

author: Helen Keller
content: Keep yourself to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadow.
content_cn: 面向阳光，阴影自消。

author: J. R. R. Tolkien
content: Not all those who wander are lost.
content_cn: 并非所有流浪者都迷失方向。

author: John Steinbeck
content: If we could learn to like ourselves, even a little, maybe our cruelties and angers might melt away.
content_cn: 若能学会悦纳自我，哪怕些许，暴戾与愤怒或将消融。

author: John Wooden
content: You can't let praise or criticism get to you. It's a weakness to get caught up in either one.
content_cn: 勿为赞誉或批评所扰。沉溺二者皆为弱点。

author: Marcel Proust
content: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
content_cn: 感激那些使我们快乐的人，他们是让灵魂绽放的迷人园丁。

author: Marie Curie
content: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
content_cn: 生活中没有可怕之物，只有需要理解之物。现在正是多理解、少恐惧之时。

author: Muriel Rukeyser
content: The universe is made of stories, not atoms.
content_cn: 宇宙由故事构成，而非原子。

author: Plato
content: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
content_cn: 智者言因有话要说，愚者言因有话要说。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: We must be as courteous to a man as we are to a picture, which we are willing to give the advantage of a good light.
content_cn: 待人当如待画，愿予良好光线之便。

author: Robert Graves
content: Intuition is the supra-logic that cuts out all the routine processes of thought and leaps straight from the problem to the answer.
content_cn: 直觉是超越逻辑的，它跳过所有常规思维过程，直接从问题跃至答案。

author: Simone Weil
content: Liberty, taking the word in its concrete sense, consists in the ability to choose.
content_cn: 自由，就其具体意义而言，在于选择的能力。

author: Thomas Jefferson
content: Reason and free inquiry are the only effectual agents against error.
content_cn: 理性与自由探究是抵御谬误的唯一有效力量。

author: William Shakespeare
content: Go to your bosom: Knock there and ask your heart what it doth know.
content_cn: 叩问心扉：轻叩询问汝心所知。

author: Isocrates
content: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
content_cn: 真知在于自知无知。

author: Rowan Williams
content: And when the world is created, it is created in such a way that those eternal objects of God's loving wisdom become actualities - interacting with one another, relating to God in the finite realm.
content_cn: 世界被创造时，上帝慈爱智慧中的永恒客体便成为现实——彼此互动，在有限领域与上帝相连。

author: Larry Niven
content: Ethics change with technology.
content_cn: 伦理随技术而变。

author: Euripides
content: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
content_cn: 一位忠诚朋友抵得过万千亲戚。

author: Washington Irving
content: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
content_cn: 远方友人的记忆多么甜美！如落日柔光，温柔而忧伤地洒落心田。

author: Woody Allen
content: His lack of education is more than compensated for by his keenly developed moral bankruptcy.
content_cn: 他极度发展的道德沦丧，远胜于教育缺失。

author: Albert Einstein
content: Setting an example is not the main means of influencing another, it is the only means.
content_cn: 以身作则非主要影响方式，而是唯一方式。

author: Charlotte Brontë
content: Life is so constructed that an event does not, cannot, will not, match the expectation.
content_cn: 人生如此构造：事件总与期望不符、不能、也不会相符。

author: Corita Kent
content: Life is a succession of moments. To live each one is to succeed.
content_cn: 生命是连续瞬间。活好每一刻即是成功。

author: Dalai Lama
content: If we have a positive mental attitude, then even when surrounded by hostility, we shall not lack inner peace.
content_cn: 若持积极心态，纵处敌意环绕，内心亦不乏安宁。

author: Elizabeth Browning
content: Light tomorrow with today!
content_cn: 以今日之光照亮明日！
author_cn: 伊丽莎白·巴雷特·布朗宁

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
content: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
content_cn: 力竭之际，系结坚持。

author: Helen Keller
content: Face your deficiencies and acknowledge them; but do not let them master you. Let them teach you patience, sweetness, insight.
content_cn: 直面不足并承认，但勿被其主宰。让它们教你耐心、温和与洞察。

author: James Oppenheim
content: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance, the wise grows it under his feet.
content_cn: 愚者远方觅乐，智者脚下种福。

author: Jim Rohn
content: The more you care, the stronger you can be.
content_cn: 愈是在意，愈能强大。

author: Napoleon
content: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
content_cn: 胜利属于最坚韧者。

author: Oprah Winfrey
content: With every experience, you alone are painting your own canvas, thought by thought, choice by choice.
content_cn: 每一经历皆由你独自挥毫，一思一择，绘就人生画卷。

author: Oscar Wilde
content: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
content_cn: 最微小的善行，胜过最宏伟的意图。

author: Richard Bach
content: Every gift from a friend is a wish for your happiness.
content_cn: 朋友的每份礼物，都是对你幸福的祝愿。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Miracles come in moments. Be ready and willing.
content_cn: 奇迹转瞬即至。做好准备，心怀意愿。

author: Winston Churchill
content: Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
content_cn: 勇气是经历失败而不失热情。

author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
content: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?
content_cn: 有何智慧能胜过仁慈？

author: Marilyn vos Savant
content: To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe.
content_cn: 求知须学习，得智靠观察。

author: Clay Shirky
content: Communications tools don't get socially interesting until they get technologically boring.
content_cn: 通讯工具直到技术层面变得乏味，才会在社会层面变得有趣。

author: Man Ray
content: Technology is anything that wasn't around when you were born.
content_cn: 科技即你出生时尚不存在之物。

author: Richard Burton
content: False friendship, like the ivy, decays and ruins the walls it embraces; but true friendship gives new life and animation to the object it supports.
content_cn: 虚假友谊如常春藤，腐蚀所攀附之墙；真正友谊则赋予支持对象新生与活力。

author: Giotto
content: The sincere friends of this world are as ship lights in the stormiest of nights.
content_cn: 世间真诚友人，犹如暴风雨夜中的船灯。

author: Albert Camus
content: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.
content_cn: 秋天是第二个春天，每片叶子都是花朵。

author: Bertrand Russell
content: The happiness that is genuinely satisfying is accompanied by the fullest exercise of our faculties and the fullest realization of the world in which we live.
content_cn: 真正令人满足的幸福，伴随着我们能力的充分运用和对所处世界的充分认识。

author: Dalai Lama
content: See the positive side, the potential, and make an effort.
content_cn: 看到积极面、潜力，并付出努力。

author: Helen Keller
content: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
content_cn: 当一扇幸福之门关闭，另一扇会打开；但我们往往长久凝视关闭的门，而看不见已打开的门。

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self-giving love.
content_cn: 宽恕是选择去爱。它是无私之爱的首要技能。

author: Paavo Nurmi
content: Mind is everything: muscle, pieces of rubber. All that I am, I am because of my mind.
content_cn: 心智即一切：肌肉不过橡皮块。我之成就，皆源心智。

author: Pablo Picasso
content: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
content_cn: 我总做不会之事，为求学会如何做。

author: Richard Garriott
content: Chaos and Order are not enemies, only opposites.
content_cn: 混沌与秩序非敌，仅为对立。

author: Thích Nhất Hạnh
content: The amount of happiness that you have depends on the amount of freedom you have in your heart.
content_cn: 幸福多寡，取决于心中自由几何。

author: William Arthur Ward
content: Four steps to achievement: Plan purposefully. Prepare prayerfully. Proceed positively. Pursue persistently.
content_cn: 成功四步：目标明确规划，虔诚准备，积极行动，执着追求。

author: Lucretius
content: The fall of dropping water wears away the Stone.
content_cn: 滴水穿石。

author: Walter Benjamin
content: The art of storytelling is reaching its end because the epic side of truth, wisdom, is dying out.
content_cn: 叙事艺术正走向终结，因真理与智慧的史诗性正在消逝。

author: Avery Brooks
content: Knowledge is going to make you stronger. Knowledge is going to let you control your life. Knowledge is going to give you the wisdom to teach their children. Knowledge is the thing that makes you smile in the face of disaster.
content_cn: 知识使你强大，让你掌控人生，赋予教育子女的智慧，使你在灾难面前仍能微笑。

author: Don DeLillo
content: This is the whole point of technology. It creates an appetite for immortality on the one hand. It threatens universal extinction on the other. Technology is lust removed from nature.
content_cn: 此乃技术本质：既激发对不朽的渴望，又威胁普世灭绝。技术是脱离自然的欲望。

author: Thomas Edison
content: I have friends in overalls whose friendship I would not swap for the favor of the kings of the world.
content_cn: 我珍视那些身着工装的朋友，他们的情谊胜过世间所有君王的垂青。

author: Steven Van Zandt
content: Rock n' roll as a genre is different from pop and hip hop: it is about bands, and that for me suggests brotherhood, family, friendship and community.
content_cn: 摇滚乐不同于流行与嘻哈：它关乎乐队，对我而言意味着手足之情、家庭温暖、真挚友谊与群体共鸣。

author: Woody Allen
content: I'm astounded by people who want to 'know' the universe when it's hard enough to find your way around Chinatown.
content_cn: 那些妄图'认知'宇宙的人令我震惊——他们连唐人街的路都认不全。

author: A. Powell Davies
content: Life is just a chance to grow a soul.
content_cn: 生命不过是培育灵魂的契机。

author: Confucius
content: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
content_cn: 至伟之荣，不在永不跌倒，而在每次跌倒后都能站起。

author: John Powell
content: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
content_cn: 真正的错误，是从中一无所获的错误。

author: Lou Holtz
content: I can't believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary.
content_cn: 我不信上帝让我们降临人世只为平庸度日。

author: Max Planck
content: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
content_cn: 使人丰盈幸福的不是占有真理，而是追求真理过程中获得的成长。

author: Michael Korda
content: To succeed, we must first believe that we can.
content_cn: 欲成大事，必先自信其能。

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world's problems.
content_cn: 我们的实际作为与潜在能力之间的差距，足以解决世间多数难题。

author: Sam Keen
content: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.
content_cn: 爱的真谛不在于找到完美之人，而在于学会完整地看待不完美之人。

author: Euripides
content: Leave no stone unturned.
content_cn: 翻遍每一块石头——穷尽所有可能。

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: There is more wisdom in your body than in your deepest philosophy.
content_cn: 你身体蕴含的智慧，远胜最深奥的哲学。

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: Does wisdom perhaps appear on the earth as a raven which is inspired by the smell of carrion?
content_cn: 难道智慧降临尘世时，竟如嗅到腐肉气味的乌鸦？

author: Will Durant
content: Science gives us knowledge, but only philosophy can give us wisdom.
content_cn: 科学予人知识，唯哲学能赐智慧。

author: Stewart Brand
content: Once a new technology rolls over you, if you're not part of the steamroller, you're part of the road.
content_cn: 当新技术碾压而来，不做压路机，便成铺路石。

author: Len Wein
content: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
content_cn: 真朋友会在心向别处时仍为你守候。

author: Arthur Conan Doyle
content: Whenever you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
content_cn: 排除所有不可能后，剩下的即便再不可思议，也必是真相。

author: Confucius
content: To give oneself earnestly to the duties due to men, and, while respecting spiritual beings, to keep aloof from them, may be called wisdom.
content_cn: 务民之义，敬鬼神而远之，可谓知矣。

author: Denis Waitley
content: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist or accept responsibility for changing them.
content_cn: 人生两大选择：安于现状，或担起改变之责。

author: Ellen Gilchrist
content: Don't ruin the present with the ruined past.
content_cn: 莫让破碎的过去毁损完好的当下。

author: Joseph Campbell
content: When we quit thinking primarily about ourselves and our own self-preservation, we undergo a truly heroic transformation of consciousness.
content_cn: 当不再汲汲于自我保全时，意识便经历着真正的英雄式蜕变。

author: Judy Garland
content: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
content_cn: 因你低语非入我耳，而是我心；所吻非我唇，而是我魂。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Look back over the past, with its changing empires that rose and fell, and you can foresee the future, too.
content_cn: 回望兴衰更替的帝国往事，便可预见未来。

author: Nikola Tesla
content: Let the future tell the truth and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
content_cn: 让未来诉说真相，依作为评判世人。当下属于他们，而我耕耘的未来属于我。

author: Og Mandino
content: Do all things with love.
content_cn: 怀爱而行万事。

author: René Descartes
content: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it.
content_cn: 将每个难题分解为可解决的若干部分。

author: Seneca the Younger
content: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
content_cn: 伟大的天才总带几分癫狂。

author: Sigmund Freud
content: From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
content_cn: 穿越重重谬误，方能得见全部真相。

author: Tryon Edwards
content: He that never changes his opinions, never corrects his mistakes, and will never be wiser on the morrow than he is today.
content_cn: 固执己见不改错者，永无长进之日。

author: W. H. Auden
content: To choose what is difficult all one's days, as if it were easy, that is faith.
content_cn: 毕生择难而行，举重若轻，是为信念。

author: William Blake
content: The road of excess leads to the palace of wisdom.
content_cn: 极致之路，通往智慧殿堂。

author: Mencius
content: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
content_cn: 友也者，两体同心。

author: John Locke
content: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
content_cn: 因事业结成的友谊，胜过因友谊促成的事业。

author: Emily Dickinson
content: My friends are my estate.
content_cn: 朋友即我之财富。

author: A. Powell Davies
content: When a friend is in trouble, don't annoy him by asking if there is anything you can do. Think up something appropriate and do it.
content_cn: 朋友遇困时，莫问'我能做什么'徒增其扰，径行恰当之事即可。

author: Albert Schweitzer
content: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
content_cn: 通过克服障碍获得的力量，才是战胜逆境的唯一力量。

author: Albert Schweitzer
content: Wherever a man turns he can find someone who needs him.
content_cn: 人无论转向何方，总能遇见需要自己的人。

author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
content: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly, what is essential is invisible to the eye.
content_cn: 唯有用心灵才能看清本质，真正重要的东西肉眼无法看见。

author: Booker T. Washington
content: Excellence is to do a common thing in an uncommon way.
content_cn: 卓越就是以非凡之道行平凡之事。

author: Brian Tracy
content: There is never enough time to do everything, but there is always enough time to do the most important thing.
content_cn: 时间永远不够做完所有事，但总够做最重要的事。

author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman
content: Let us revere, let us worship, but erect and open-eyed, the highest, not the lowest; the future, not the past!
content_cn: 让我们昂首睁眼，崇拜至高而非至低，向往未来而非过去！

author: Daisaku Ikeda
content: If we look at the world with a love of life, the world will reveal its beauty to us.
content_cn: 以热爱生命之眼观世界，世界自会展现其美。

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: Knowing is not enough; we must apply!
content_cn: 仅仅知道不够，必须付诸实践！

author: John Lennon
content: You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one, I hope someday you will join us, and the world will live as one.
content_cn: 你或笑我痴人说梦，然我并非独行者。愿某日你亦加入，让世界融为一体。

author: Maya Angelou
content: I believe that every person is born with talent.
content_cn: 我坚信人人天赋异禀。

author: Plato
content: Wise men talk because they have something to say; fools, because they have to say something.
content_cn: 智者言因有所悟，愚者言因有所欲。

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
author_cn: 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森
content: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
content_cn: 莫以收获评每日，当以播种量朝夕。

author: Thích Nhất Hạnh
content: The most precious gift we can offer anyone is our attention. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
content_cn: 我们能给予他人的最珍贵礼物是全神贯注。当正念拥抱所爱之人，他们便会如花绽放。

author: Voltaire
content: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.
content_cn: 沉湎不幸愈久，其伤害愈深。

author: Walt Whitman
content: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
content_cn: 永远面朝阳光，阴影自会落在身后。

author: Woodrow Wilson
content: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
content_cn: 你非仅为谋生而来，而是为使世界更丰盈、视野更开阔、希望与成就之精神更高尚。你来是为丰富世界，若忘记此使命，便是 impoverish 自己。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Before we acquire great power, we must acquire wisdom to use it well.
content_cn: 获得大能之前，须先得善用之智。

author: George Washington
content: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence.
content_cn: 以礼待众人，仅与少数人亲密，且需久经考验方托付信任。

author: Oscar Wilde
content: True friends stab you in the front.
content_cn: 真友当面刺你。

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for truth.
content_cn: 勿为流露真情致歉，如此等于为真理道歉。

author: Charles F. Kettering
content: One fails forward toward success.
content_cn: 人通过失败迈向成功。

author: Edith Wharton
content: If only wed stop trying to be happy wed have a pretty good time.
content_cn: 只要不再刻意追求快乐，我们反而能过得很好。

author: Epictetus
content: When you are offended at any man's fault, turn to yourself and study your own failings. Then you will forget your anger.
content_cn: 因他人过失动怒时，反观己过，怒气自消。

author: Galileo Galilei
content: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.
content_cn: 真理一旦发现皆易理解，关键在于发现它们。

author: George Sand
content: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
content_cn: 人生唯一幸福，在于爱与被爱。

author: John Dewey
content: Without some goals and some efforts to reach it, no man can live.
content_cn: 无目标与努力，无人能生存。

author: John Lubbock
content: A day of worry is more exhausting than a day of work.
content_cn: 忧心一日比劳作一日更疲惫。

author: Leonardo da Vinci
content: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do.
content_cn: 行动之紧迫令我震撼。知不足够，必须践行；意愿不足够，必须行动。

author: Louisa May Alcott
content: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
content_cn: 我不惧风暴，因正学习掌舵。

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: We must become the change we want to see.
content_cn: 欲见改变，先成改变。

author: Moncure D. Conway
content: The best thing in every noble dream is the dreamer...
content_cn: 每个崇高梦想中最美好的是追梦人...

author: Napoleon Hill
content: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.
content_cn: 成功之梯顶端从不拥挤。

author: Oscar Wilde
content: Experience is simply the name we give our mistakes.
content_cn: 经验只是我们给错误起的别名。

author: Peter Drucker
content: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
content_cn: 预测未来最好方式就是创造它。

author: Seneca the Younger
content: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
content_cn: 愤怒最佳解药是暂缓。

author: Sophocles
content: Ignorant men don't know what good they hold in their hands until they've flung it away.
content_cn: 愚者总在抛弃后才知手中珍宝。

author: Uta Hagen
content: We must overcome the notion that we must be regular. It robs you of the chance to be extraordinary and leads you to the mediocre.
content_cn: 必须摒弃循规蹈矩的观念，它剥夺你非凡的机会，引你走向平庸。

author: William James
content: The greatest discovery of our generation is that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind. As you think, so shall you be.
content_cn: 我们这代人最伟大的发现是：人可以通过改变心态来改变生活。思如其人。

author: William Butler Yeats
content: Think as a wise man but communicate in the language of the people.
content_cn: 如智者般思考，用大众语言交流。

author: Swami Vivekananda
content: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far.
content_cn: 思想塑造我们；故慎思。言语次之，思想鲜活，传播深远。

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: Without freedom of thought, there can be no such thing as wisdom - and no such thing as public liberty without freedom of speech.
content_cn: 无思想自由则无智慧，无言论自由则无公众自由。

author: Lord Byron
content: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.
content_cn: 友谊常升华为爱情，但爱情永不退为友谊。

author: Woody Allen
content: I took a speed-reading course and read 'War and Peace' in twenty minutes. It involves Russia.
content_cn: 我学了速读，二十分钟读完《战争与和平》。故事发生在俄国。

author: Alexis Carrel
content: All great men are gifted with intuition. They know without reasoning or analysis, what they need to know.
content_cn: 伟人皆有直觉天赋，无需推理分析便知所需。

author: Carl Jung
content: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.
content_cn: 知识不仅基于真理，亦基于谬误。

author: Doug Larson
content: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you'd have preferred to talk.
content_cn: 智慧是对你一生倾听的奖赏，尽管你本更愿发言。

author: Epictetus
content: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not but rejoices for those which he has.
content_cn: 智者不悲所无，而乐所有。

author: Heraclitus
content: All is flux; nothing stays still.
content_cn: 万物皆流，无物常驻。

author: John Lennon
content: Time you enjoy wasting, was not wasted.
content_cn: 乐在其中的时光不算虚度。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: The world has the habit of making room for the man whose actions show that he knows where he is going.
content_cn: 世界总会为行动显示方向的人让路。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Life is a succession of lessons, which must be lived to be understood.
content_cn: 生命是连续的课程，必须亲历才能理解。

author: Rita Mae Brown
content: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work.
content_cn: 创意源于信任。信你的直觉。工作永远要比希望多。

author: Thomas Carlyle
content: Instead of saying that man is the creature of circumstance, it would be nearer the mark to say that man is the architect of circumstance.
content_cn: 与其说人是环境的产物，不如说人是环境的建筑师更贴切。

author: Joan Rivers
content: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
content_cn: 昨日是历史，明日是谜团，今日是神的礼物，故我们称其为现在(present双关)。

author: Ezra Stiles
content: A monarchy conducted with infinite wisdom and infinite benevolence is the most perfect of all possible governments.
content_cn: 以无限智慧与仁慈施政的君主制，是所有可能政体中最完美的。

author: Herbert Hoover
content: Wisdom often times consists of knowing what to do next.
content_cn: 智慧常在于知下一步该做什么。

author: John Brunner
content: It's supposed to be automatic, but actually you have to push this button.
content_cn: 本该是自动的，但实际上你得按这个按钮。

author: Marilyn Monroe
content: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.
content_cn: 爱情专家说幸福婚姻不能仅有激情，持久结合需要彼此真诚喜爱。在我看来，这正是友谊的好定义。

author: William Shakespeare
content: Action is eloquence.
content_cn: 行动即雄辩。

author: Albert Einstein
content: I never think of the future. It comes soon enough.
content_cn: 我从不思考未来，它来得已经够快。

author: Aristotle
content: Moral excellence comes about as a result of habit. We become just by doing just acts, temperate by doing temperate acts, brave by doing brave acts.
content_cn: 德性源于习惯。行公正成公正，行节制成节制，行勇敢成勇敢。

author: Bob Newhart
content: All I can say about life is, Oh God, enjoy it!
content_cn: 关于生活我只能说：天啊，享受它吧！

author: Confucius
content: Sincerity is the way of Heaven. The attainment of sincerity is the way of men.
content_cn: 诚者，天之道也；诚之者，人之道也。

author: Epictetus
content: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
content_cn: 达幸福唯一途径，是停止为意志不及之事忧虑。

author: Horace
content: Adversity has the effect of eliciting talents, which in prosperous circumstances would have lain dormant.
content_cn: 逆境显才华，顺境隐天资。

author: Immanuel Kant
content: All our knowledge begins with the senses, proceeds then to the understanding, and ends with reason. There is nothing higher than reason.
