content_cn: 吾辈认知始于感官，进于悟性，终于理性。理性至高无上。

author: J. Willard Marriott
content: Good timber does not grow with ease; the stronger the wind, the stronger the trees.
content_cn: 良材不天生，风疾木愈劲。

author: Jane Addams
content: Nothing could be worse than the fear that one had given up too soon and left one unexpended effort that might have saved the world.
content_cn: 世间至惧，莫过于因过早放弃而未尽之力，本可扭转乾坤。

author: John Wooden
content: Never mistake activity for achievement.
content_cn: 勿将忙碌当作为成就。

author: Laozi
content: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.
content_cn: 天下莫柔弱于水，而攻坚强者莫之能胜。

author: Laozi
content: The power of intuitive understanding will protect you from harm until the end of your days.
content_cn: 知常曰明，没身不殆。

author: Margaret Mead
content: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
content_cn: 当记己身举世无双，恰似芸芸众生。

author: Maya Angelou
content: When you learn, teach. When you get, give.
content_cn: 学成则授人，得道则济世。

author: Peter Abelard
content: The beginning of wisdom is found in doubting; by doubting we come to the question, and by seeking we may come upon the truth.
content_cn: 智慧始于疑，疑而生问，索问得真知。

author: Richard Whately
content: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
content_cn: 晨失一时辰，终日寻无踪。

author: Rumi
content: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.
content_cn: 且随心之所向，默然相从。

author: Václav Havel
content: Work for something because it is good, not just because it stands a chance to succeed.
content_cn: 为善而行，非为成事之机。

author: Walter Inglis Anderson
content: Nothing diminishes anxiety faster than action.
content_cn: 行动乃消愁之速剂。

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
content_cn: 须记失败乃事非人。

author: Arthur Ashe
content: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
content_cn: 立足当下，尽汝所有，竭汝所能。

author: Wilson Mizner
content: To profit from good advice requires more wisdom than to give it.
content_cn: 纳谏之智，尤胜进言。

author: Northrop Frye
content: The most technologically efficient machine that man has ever invented is the book.
content_cn: 书籍乃人类智慧至臻之器。

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
content_cn: 友谊之语不在言，而在心领神会。

author: Doug Larson
content: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
content_cn: 真友者，容汝之失，亦纳汝之成。

author: Fawn M. Brodie
content: A passion for politics stems usually from an insatiable need, either for power, or for friendship and adulation, or a combination of both.
content_cn: 政途热忱，或源于权欲难填，或渴慕知交谀辞，抑或二者兼之。

author: Woody Allen
content: Eternal nothingness is fine if you happen to be dressed for it.
content_cn: 永恒虚空不足惧，只需衣冠得体赴幽冥。

author: Abraham Lincoln
content: I will prepare and someday my chance will come.
content_cn: 枕戈待旦，终逢其时。

author: Zig Ziglar
content: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
content_cn: 心存阳春，万事胜阴霾。

author: Sophocles
content: Quick decisions are unsafe decisions.
content_cn: 骤决多舛，徐图乃安。

author: Morihei Ueshiba
content: Always keep your mind as bright and clear as the vast sky, the great ocean, and the highest peak, empty of all thoughts. Always keep your body filled with light and heat. Fill yourself with the power of wisdom and enlightenment.
content_cn: 心若长空碧海，澄明无垢；身似赤日皓月，光热充盈。以慧能启明性，以悟道涤灵台。

author: Jean-Paul Sartre
content: Commitment is an act, not a word.
content_cn: 诺者行胜于言。

author: John F. Kennedy
content: I look forward to a great future for America - a future in which our country will match its military strength with our moral restraint, its wealth with our wisdom, its power with our purpose.
content_cn: 吾瞻美利坚盛世：以道义制衡武备，以睿智驾驭丰饶，以宏旨引领强权。

author: Horace
content: A heart well prepared for adversity in bad times hopes, and in good times fears for a change in fortune.
content_cn: 处厄运而怀希冀，居顺境则忧变数，此乃备患之心。

author: Aristotle
content: Friendship is essentially a partnership.
content_cn: 友谊之本，实为盟契。

author: Woody Allen
content: It seemed the world was divided into good and bad people. The good ones slept better... while the bad ones seemed to enjoy the waking hours much more.
content_cn: 世间人分善恶，善者安眠，恶者耽欢醒时。

author: Anne Lamott
content: Joy is the best makeup.
content_cn: 悦色乃最佳粉黛。

author: Anne Lindbergh
content: If one is estranged from oneself, then one is estranged from others too. If one is out of touch with oneself, then one cannot touch others.
content_cn: 失己者必失人，忘我者难动人。

author: Aristotle
content: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
content_cn: 日行即我，卓越非为，乃成习也。

author: Blaise Pascal
content: The least movement is of importance to all nature. The entire ocean is affected by a pebble.
content_cn: 一芥之动关乎乾坤，片石能激沧海澜。

author: Brian Tracy
content: Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.
content_cn: 志者，功业之炉薪也。

author: Bruce Lee
content: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
content_cn: 过而能认，善莫大焉。

author: Charles Darwin
content: The highest stage in moral culture at which we can arrive is when we recognize that we ought to control our thoughts.
content_cn: 德修至境，在于知御心念。

author: Confucius
content: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
content_cn: 生之本简，人自繁之。

author: Dalai Lama
content: People take different roads seeking fulfilment and happiness. Just because they're not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
content_cn: 众生寻乐各有途，非同道者未必迷。

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
content_cn: 上士论道，中士论事，下士论人。

author: Francis Bacon
content: A prudent question is one half of wisdom.
content_cn: 善问者已得半智。

author: George Bernard Shaw
content: The possibilities are numerous once we decide to act and not react.
content_cn: 主动则天地宽，被动则囿方圆。

author: George Orwell
content: Myths which are believed in tend to become true.
content_cn: 众信之谬，终成真谛。

author: George Washington
content: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
content_cn: 宁独善其身，勿滥交损德。

author: Janis Joplin
content: Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got.
content_cn: 勿屈己志，汝即所有。

author: Laozi
content: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach him how to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
content_cn: 授人以鱼不如授人以渔。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Happiness is found in doing, not merely possessing.
content_cn: 乐在行而非得。

author: Oprah Winfrey
content: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
content_cn: 人生至伟之冒险，莫过于逐梦而活。

author: Pema Chödrön
content: It isn't what happens to us that causes us to suffer; it's what we say to ourselves about what happens.
content_cn: 困苦非源于事，而生于心之所诠。

author: Peter Drucker
content: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
content_cn: 最无用之事，莫过于高效地完成根本不该做的事。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Go put your creed into the deed. Nor speak with double tongue.
content_cn: 将信念付诸行动，勿口是心非。

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
author_cn: 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森
content: To be what we are, and to become what we are capable of becoming, is the only end of life.
content_cn: 成为真正的自己，并成就所能成就的一切，是人生唯一的目标。

author: Tony Robbins
content: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
content_cn: 设定目标是将无形转化为可见的第一步。

author: William James
content: The deepest craving of human nature is the need to be appreciated.
content_cn: 人性最深切的渴望，是被欣赏的需要。

author: Anatole France
content: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.
content_cn: 说话中学说话，学习中学学习，奔跑中学奔跑，工作中学工作；爱亦如此——以爱习爱。

author: Aristotle
content: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
content_cn: 思想的力量是生命的精髓。

author: The Buddha
content: Conditions fall apart. Persist with diligence.
content_cn: 诸行无常。当以精进心，持之以恒。

author: Colette
content: I love my past. I love my present. I'm not ashamed of what I've had, and I'm not sad because I have it no longer.
content_cn: 我热爱我的过去，也热爱我的现在。不为曾经的拥有而羞耻，亦不为不再拥有而悲伤。

author: Daisaku Ikeda
content: The person who lives life fully, glowing with life's energy, is the person who lives a successful life.
content_cn: 全然活出生命光彩、绽放生命能量的人，才是真正成功的人。

author: Denis Waitley
content: A dream is your creative vision for your life in the future. You must break out of your current comfort zone and become comfortable with the unfamiliar and the unknown.
content_cn: 梦想是你对未来的创造性愿景。必须跳出舒适区，在陌生与未知中自在前行。

author: Etty Hillesum
content: Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
content_cn: 有时一整天中最重要的事，不过是两次深呼吸之间的片刻休憩。

author: John Junor
content: An ounce of emotion is equal to a ton of facts.
content_cn: 一盎司的情感抵得上一吨的事实。

author: Margaret Cousins
content: Appreciation can make a day, even change a life. Your willingness to put it into words is all that is necessary.
content_cn: 赞赏能点亮一天，甚至改变一生。而你只需愿意将它诉诸言语。

author: Ovid
content: Chance is always powerful. Let your hook be always cast; in the pool where you least expect it, there will be a fish.
content_cn: 机遇之力不可小觑。永远抛出你的钓线——在最意想不到的池中，必有鱼上钩。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
content_cn: 薄冰滑行时，安全系于速度。

author: Ralph Marston
content: Let go of your attachment to being right, and suddenly your mind is more open. You're able to benefit from the unique viewpoints of others, without being crippled by your own judgement.
content_cn: 放下'正确'的执念，心智自会豁然开朗。你将从他人独特观点中获益，而不被自我判断所束缚。

author: Rumi
content: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
content_cn: 让你所爱之美，成为你所行之事。

author: Ben Fountain
content: Democracy's premise rests on the notion that the collective wisdom of the majority will prove right more often than it's wrong; that given sufficient opportunity in the pursuit of happiness, your population will develop its talents, its intellect, its better judgment; that over time its capacity for discernment and self-correction will be enlarged.
content_cn: 民主的前提在于：多数人的集体智慧正确多于谬误；赋予充分追求幸福的机会，民众自会发展才能、智慧与判断力；其明辨与自我修正的能力亦将随时间增长。

author: Laurence J. Peter
content: Life is a travelling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.
content_cn: 人生是行至认知边缘，而后纵身一跃的旅程。

author: Robert F. Kennedy
content: Tragedy is a tool for the living to gain wisdom, not a guide by which to live.
content_cn: 悲剧是生者获取智慧的工具，而非生活的指南。

author: Aristotle
content: The virtue of justice consists in moderation, as regulated by wisdom.
content_cn: 公正之德在于中庸，以智慧为度。

author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
content: Remember that the most valuable antiques are dear old friends.
content_cn: 须知最珍贵的古董，是亲爱的老友。

author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
content: Remember that a gesture of friendship, no matter how small, is always appreciated.
content_cn: 请记住：友谊的示意，再微小也总被珍视。

author: Albert Einstein
content: The only real valuable thing is intuition.
content_cn: 直觉才是唯一真正有价值的东西。

author: Andy Warhol
content: They say that time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
content_cn: 人们说时间改变一切，其实你必须亲自去改变。

author: Dalai Lama
content: Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck.
content_cn: 须知有时求而不得，实乃天赐幸运。

author: Dorothy Thompson
content: Fear grows in darkness; if you think there's a bogeyman around, turn on the light.
content_cn: 恐惧在黑暗中滋长；若觉鬼怪临近，不妨点亮灯光。

author: Epictetus
content: Freedom is the right to live as we wish.
content_cn: 自由即按意愿生活的权利。

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
content_cn: 实现明天的唯一限制，是我们今天的疑虑。

author: John F. Kennedy
content: Let us resolve to be masters, not the victims, of our history, controlling our own destiny without giving way to blind suspicions and emotions.
content_cn: 让我们决心成为历史的主宰而非牺牲品，掌控自身命运，不向盲目猜疑与情绪让步。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it.
content_cn: 非义勿行，非真勿言。

author: Mortimer J. Adler
content: The purpose of learning is growth, and our minds, unlike our bodies, can continue growing as we continue to live.
content_cn: 学习的目的在于成长。与身体不同，只要生命延续，心智便可持续成长。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
content_cn: 目标就是附有期限的梦想。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Do not waste yourself in rejection, nor bark against the bad, but chant the beauty of the good.
content_cn: 勿在拒绝中消耗自我，亦勿斥责丑恶，当歌颂美好之物。

author: Dalai Lama
content: When we feel love and kindness toward others, it not only makes others feel loved and cared for, but it helps us also to develop inner happiness and peace.
content_cn: 当我们对他人怀有爱与善意，不仅使对方感受被爱与被关怀，更助长自身内在的喜乐与平和。

author: Thomas Carlyle
content: Do not be embarrassed by your mistakes. Nothing can teach us better than our understanding of them. This is one of the best ways of self-education.
content_cn: 勿因错误而窘迫。没有什么比领悟错误更能教导我们，此乃最佳自学之道。

author: Walt Disney
content: We've got to have a dream if we are going to make a dream come true.
content_cn: 欲使梦想成真，必先心怀梦想。

author: Jim Rohn
content: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
content_cn: 自律是连接目标与成就的桥梁。

author: John Wooden
content: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful.
content_cn: 天赋神赐，当谦卑；名声人予，当感恩；自负己授，当谨慎。

author: Kahlil Gibran
content: Pain and foolishness lead to great bliss and complete knowledge, for Eternal Wisdom created nothing under the sun in vain.
content_cn: 痛苦与愚昧终将引向至福与全知，因永恒智慧所创万物，皆非徒然。

author: Maria Montessori
content: Everyone in the world ought to do the things for which he is specially adapted. It is the part of wisdom to recognize what each one of us is best fitted for, and it is the part of education to perfect and utilize such predispositions. Because education can direct and aid nature but can never transform her.
content_cn: 世人皆应从事天性适宜之事。智慧在于认清自己最适合的领域，教育则在于完善并运用这种禀赋。因教育可引导辅助天性，却无法改变其本质。

author: Hermann Hesse
content: Wisdom is nothing but a preparation of the soul, a capacity, a secret art of thinking, feeling and breathing thoughts of unity at every moment of life.
content_cn: 智慧无非是灵魂的准备，一种能力，一种在生命每时每刻思考、感受并呼吸合一之念的隐秘艺术。

author: Plato
content: Wisdom alone is the science of other sciences.
content_cn: 唯智慧乃众科之学。

author: Aeschylus
content: It is good even for old men to learn wisdom.
content_cn: 纵使老者，习得智慧亦为善事。

author: Albert Einstein
content: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
content_cn: 一个触目惊心的事实已然显现：我们的技术已超越了人性。

author: Jerome
content: True friendship ought never to conceal what it thinks.
content_cn: 真正的友谊从不隐藏所思所想。

author: George Santayana
content: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.
content_cn: 朋友是让你能成为'人'的那部分人类。

author: Albert Einstein
content: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
content_cn: 现实不过是幻象，尽管这幻象顽固非常。

author: Benjamin Disraeli
content: The greatest good you can do for another is not just share your riches but reveal to them their own.
content_cn: 为他人谋最大福祉，非分享己之财富，乃使其发现自身宝藏。

author: Billie Armstrong
content: Our passion is our strength.
content_cn: 热忱即力量。

author: David Eddings
content: No day in which you learn something is a complete loss.
content_cn: 有所得之日，绝非虚度。

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
content: He that respects himself is safe from others; he wears a coat of mail that none can pierce.
content_cn: 自尊者人恒敬之，如着无形铠甲，刀枪不入。

author: Katherine Mansfield
content: Make it a rule of life never to regret and never to look back. Regret is an appalling waste of energy; you can't build on it; it's only for wallowing in.
content_cn: 立人生信条：永不后悔，永不回头。悔恨是精力的可怕浪费，无法奠基，仅供沉溺。

author: Laozi
content: He who conquers others is strong; He who conquers himself is mighty.
content_cn: 胜人者有力，自胜者强。

author: Marie Curie
content: Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.
content_cn: 生活中没有可怕之物，唯有待理解之事。

author: Napoleon
content: To do all that one is able to do, is to be a man; to do all that one would like to do, is to be a god.
content_cn: 尽己所能是人，为所欲为是神。

author: Og Mandino
content: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
content_cn: 我爱光明因它指路，亦将忍受黑暗，因其示我星辰。

author: Ovid
content: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
content_cn: 休憩吧，休耕之地必结硕果。

author: Plutarch
content: Know how to listen, and you will profit even from those who talk badly.
content_cn: 懂得倾听，纵拙言者亦能使你受益。

author: Søren Kierkegaard
content: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
content_cn: 生命非待解难题，而是需体验之现实。

author: Theodore H. White
content: To go against the dominant thinking of your friends, of most of the people you see every day, is perhaps the most difficult act of heroism you can perform.
content_cn: 逆挚友与常人之主流思想而行，或许是最艰难的英勇之举。

author: Thomas Edison
content: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
content_cn: 我从未失败，只是找到了一万种无效方法。

author: William Hazlitt
content: Just as much as we see in others, we have in ourselves.
content_cn: 他人之镜像，皆映己身。

author: William Shakespeare
content: We know what we are but know not what we may be.
content_cn: 自知当下，难测未来。

author: James Gleick
content: As a technology, the book is like a hammer. That is to say, it is perfect: a tool ideally suited to its task. Hammers can be tweaked and varied but will never go obsolete. Even when builders pound nails by the thousand with pneumatic nail guns, every household needs a hammer.
content_cn: 书籍作为技术，犹如铁锤——堪称完美：与使命完美契合的工具。铁锤可改良变形却永不淘汰，纵使气动钉枪击钉千万，家家仍需铁锤。

author: George Santayana
content: Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with the part of another; people are friends in spots.
content_cn: 友谊常是两片心田的局部共鸣，人际交好总有边界。

author: Albert Schweitzer
content: An optimist is a person who sees a green light everywhere, while the pessimist sees only the red spotlight... The truly wise person is color-blind.
content_cn: 乐观者处处见绿灯，悲观者只睹红灯……真智者却是色盲。

author: William Ellery Channing
content: Every man is a volume if you know how to read him.
content_cn: 善读者眼中，人人皆是一部典籍。

author: Confucius
content: To be wrong is nothing unless you continue to remember it.
content_cn: 过而不改，是谓过矣。

author: Dalai Lama
content: Love and compassion open our own inner life, reducing stress, distrust and loneliness.
content_cn: 爱与慈悲开启心扉，消解压力、猜忌与孤独。

author: Dalai Lama
content: By going beyond your own problems and taking care of others, you gain inner strength, self-confidence, courage, and a greater sense of calm.
content_cn: 超越自身困境而关怀他人，方得内心力量、自信、勇气与更深沉的平和。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: The universe is transformation; our life is what our thoughts make it.
content_cn: 宇宙即变化，生活乃思想所塑。

author: Michael Jordan
content: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
content_cn: 接受他人期待，尤是消极预期，便永难改变结果。

author: Norman Vincent Peale
content: If you want things to be different, perhaps the answer is to become different yourself.
content_cn: 欲境遇不同，或许答案在于自我改变。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Nothing is at last sacred but the integrity of your own mind.
content_cn: 最终神圣者，唯心智之完整。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Belief consists in accepting the affirmations of the soul; Unbelief, in denying them.
content_cn: 信仰在于接纳灵魂的肯定，怀疑则是拒绝它们。

author: William Shakespeare
content: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
content_cn: 命运非星辰所控，而在己身。

author: John Muir
content: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
content_cn: 与自然同行，所得总远超所求。

author: Henry Ward Beecher
content: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
content_cn: 评判他人不应看其巅峰，而当视其出发后跋涉的距离。

author: Aristotle
content: Excellence, then, is a state concerned with choice, lying in a mean, relative to us, this being determined by reason and in the way in which the man of practical wisdom would determine it.
content_cn: 卓越乃关乎选择的状态，处于相对于我们的中道，由理性界定，依实践智慧者所决之方式。

author: Joseph Wood Krutch
content: Technology made large populations possible; large populations now make technology indispensable.
content_cn: 技术使人口膨胀成为可能，而今庞大人口又使技术不可或缺。

author: Confucius
content: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
content_cn: 疑友之过，甚于受欺。

author: Abraham Lincoln
content: You have to do your own growing no matter how tall your grandfather was.
content_cn: 纵祖辈伟岸，成长仍需亲身丈量。

author: Albert Einstein
content: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
content_cn: 昨日之学，今日之生，明日之望。

author: Anatole France
content: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
content_cn: 成伟业者，需行动亦需梦想，需规划更需信念。

author: Blaise Pascal
content: We know the truth, not only by the reason, but by the heart.
content_cn: 认知真理，不仅凭理性，亦需凭心。

author: The Buddha
content: What is past is left behind. The future is yet unreached. Whatever quality is present, clearly see it right there.
content_cn: 过去已逝，未来未至，当下诸相，如实观照。

author: Elizabeth Montagu
content: I endeavor to be wise when I cannot be merry, easy when I cannot be glad, content with what cannot be mended and patient when there is no redress.
content_cn: 不能欢愉时力求明智，无法欣喜时保持从容，无可补救时知足常乐，无处申冤时隐忍以待。

author: Gordon Hinckley
content: Our kindness may be the most persuasive argument for that which we believe.
content_cn: 善意或许是我们信念最有力的证言。

author: Honoré de Balzac
content: The smallest flower is a thought, a life answering to some feature of the Great Whole, of whom they have a persistent intuition.
content_cn: 最微小的花朵亦是一种思想，一种生命，对应着大千世界的某些特征——它们对此有着持久的直觉。

author: J. M. Barrie
content: We never understand how little we need in this world until we know the loss of it.
content_cn: 直至失去，方知在世所需原是如此之少。

author: Margaret Fuller
content: If you have knowledge, let others light their candles in it.
content_cn: 若有知识，当为他人点亮心烛。

author: Maya Angelou
content: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
content_cn: 不喜则改之，不能改则易其心。

author: Og Mandino
content: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
content_cn: 永尽全力，今日所播，他日必收。

author: Peter Elbow
content: Meaning is not what you start with but what you end up with.
content_cn: 意义非起始所有，乃终结所获。

author: Richard Bach
content: To fly as fast as thought, you must begin by knowing that you have already arrived.
content_cn: 欲速如思想，须先知你已抵达。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: There is no scarcity of opportunity to make a living at what you love; there's only scarcity of resolve to make it happen.
content_cn: 以所爱谋生的机会从不稀缺，稀缺的是使之成真的决心。

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: When in doubt, don't.
content_cn: 心存疑虑，宁勿妄动。

author: Joseph Prince
content: As you walk in God's divine wisdom, you will surely begin to see a greater measure of victory and good success in your life.
content_cn: 行于神圣智慧中，必见生命绽放更大胜利与美善成功。

author: Thomas J. Watson
content: Wisdom is the power to put our time and our knowledge to the proper use.
content_cn: 智慧乃善用光阴与学识之能。

author: John Bercow
content: Even youngish men can acquire wisdom as time goes by.
content_cn: 假以时日，少年郎亦可得道。

author: Elbert Hubbard
content: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same.
content_cn: 知己者，知汝而爱汝如初。

author: Robert Southey
content: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.
content_cn: 道合者，山海难隔，岁月不蚀。

author: Abraham Lincoln
content: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
content_cn: 伐木六时辰，磨斧占其四。

author: Anne Brontë
content: All our talents increase in the using, and every faculty, both good and bad, strengthen by exercise.
content_cn: 天赋愈用愈明，心性常习常固。

author: Alexander Chalmers
content: The grand essentials of happiness are: something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
content_cn: 人生至乐三味：有事可为，有挚可钟，有愿可期。

author: Henry James
content: Do not mind anything that anyone tells you about anyone else. Judge everyone and everything for yourself.
content_cn: 人言勿轻信，万事需亲鉴。

author: Horace
content: Begin, be bold, and venture to be wise.
content_cn: 起而行之，勇者近智。

author: John Marshall
content: To listen well is as powerful a means of communication and influence as to talk well.
content_cn: 善听之效，不逊雄辩。

author: Laozi
content: At the center of your being, you have the answer; you know who you are, and you know what you want.
content_cn: 答案自在汝心，明心则见性，见性则知求。

author: Loretta Young
content: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
content_cn: 情非觅而得，乃不期而遇。

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: Our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world as being able to remake ourselves.
content_cn: 伟哉！非在改天换地，而在脱胎换骨。

author: Mark Twain
content: There are basically two types of people. People who accomplish things, and people who claim to have accomplished things. The first group is less crowded.
content_cn: 世人二分：笃行者与自诩者，前者门庭稀落。

author: Oprah Winfrey
content: I don't believe in failure. It's not failure if you enjoyed the process.
content_cn: 乐在其中，败亦非败。

author: Pierre-Auguste Renoir
content: The pain passes, but the beauty remains.
content_cn: 痛楚如烟逝，美恒存。

author: Richard Bach
content: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
content_cn: 心念一转，前尘可易，来日可期。

author: Richard Bach
content: Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can.
content_cn: 胜者终属自信人。

author: Sai Baba
content: What is new in the world? Nothing. What is old in the world? Nothing. Everything has always been and will always be.
content_cn: 世间无新事，亦无旧事，万法如如。

author: George S. Patton
content: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
content_cn: 但示其纲，不拘其术，人必以巧思报之。

author: Anton Chekhov
content: People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy.
content_cn: 欣悦之人，不辨寒暑。

author: The Buddha
content: I am not the first Buddha who came upon Earth, nor shall I be the last. In due time, another Buddha will arise in the world - a Holy One, a supremely enlightened One, endowed with wisdom in conduct, auspicious, knowing the universe, an incomparable leader of men, a master of angels and mortals.
content_cn: 吾非世间首佛，亦非末佛。时至缘至，当有新佛降世——圣者、无上觉者、行止具足般若、瑞相庄严、洞悉寰宇、人天无上师。

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: I had three chairs in my house; one for solitude, two for friendship, three for society.
content_cn: 吾室设三椅：一为独处，二待知己，三宴宾客。

author: Paul Theroux
content: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It's also about mutual help, not about exploitation.
content_cn: 真谊者，爱其瑕，容其弱，相携而非相利用也。

author: Elbert Hubbard
content: It may happen sometimes that a long debate becomes the cause of a longer friendship. Commonly, those who dispute with one another at last agree.
content_cn: 雄辩滔滔反成莫逆之契，争锋相对终得相视而笑。

author: Albert Einstein
content: Great ideas often receive violent opposition from mediocre minds.
content_cn: 高见常遭庸人烈反。

author: The Buddha
content: Your worst enemy cannot harm you as much as your own unguarded thoughts.
content_cn: 心魔之害，甚于外敌。

author: Carl Jung
content: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
content_cn: 返观内照则心镜明，逐外者耽梦，内省者觉醒。

author: Dalai Lama
content: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
content_cn: 福非天赐，皆由己造。

author: Doris Mortman
content: Until you make peace with who you are, you will never be content with what you have.
content_cn: 未与己和，难安所有。

author: Heraclitus
content: There is nothing permanent except change.
content_cn: 万物皆流，无物常驻。

author: Joe Paterno
content: Believe deep down in your heart that you're destined to do great things.
content_cn: 从灵魂深处相信，你注定要成就非凡。

author: Marian Wright Edelman
content: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying to do the best you can every day.
content_cn: 你无需必胜，但须日日竭尽所能。

author: Maya Lin
content: To fly, we have to have resistance.
content_cn: 欲翱翔九天，须借风阻之力。

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.
content: A man may fulfil the object of his existence by asking a question he cannot answer and attempting a task he cannot achieve.
content_cn: 提出不可解之问，尝试不可成之事，方尽人生之责。
author_cn: 小奥利弗·温德尔·霍姆斯

author: Paulo Coelho
content: Write your plans in pencil and give God the eraser.
content_cn: 用铅笔书写计划，将橡皮交予上天。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: It is only when the mind and character slumber that the dress can be seen.
content_cn: 唯有当心灵与品格沉睡时，衣着才会被人注目。

author: Thomas Edison
content: The first requisite for success is the ability to apply your physical and mental energies to one problem incessantly without growing weary.
content_cn: 成功第一要务，在于将身心能量持续专注一事而不倦。

author: Thornton Wilder
content: We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.
content_cn: 唯有心灵觉察生命珍宝的时刻，我们才算真正活着。

author: William Burroughs
content: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
content_cn: 若学会放松等待，心自会回应大多疑问。

author: William Shakespeare
content: To climb steep hills requires a slow pace at first.
content_cn: 攀陡峭山丘，初始需缓步而行。

author: Michelle Obama
content: And I love that even in the toughest moments, when we're all sweating it - when we're worried that the bill won't pass, and it seems like all is lost - Barack never lets himself get distracted by the chatter and the noise. Just like his grandmother, he just keeps getting up and moving forward... with patience and wisdom, and courage and grace.
content_cn: 我深爱这般品质：即便在最艰难时刻——当我们都焦灼不安，当法案可能流产、一切看似无望时——巴拉克从不让喧嚣干扰心志。如他的祖母那般，他只是不断起身前行……带着耐心与智慧，勇气与从容。

author: Phil Jackson
content: Always keep an open mind and a compassionate heart.
content_cn: 永保开放之心，常怀慈悲之念。

author: Plato
content: There are three classes of men; lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain.
content_cn: 人有三类：爱智者，爱誉者，爱利者。

author: Anaïs Nin
content: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
content_cn: 每位朋友都代表我们内心的一个世界，这个世界若非他们的到来便不会诞生。唯有相遇，新世界方得显现。

author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
content: Acquaintances we meet, enjoy, and can easily leave behind; but friendship grows deep roots.
content_cn: 泛泛之交可遇可别，真挚友谊根深蒂固。

author: Augustine of Hippo
content: I want my friend to miss me as long as I miss him.
content_cn: 愿友人思念我，如我思念他那般长久。

author: Albert Einstein
content: I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
content_cn: 我相信简朴克己的生活方式，对每个人的身心都是最有益的。

author: Aristotle
content: If one way be better than another, that you may be sure is nature's way.
content_cn: 若某条路优于其他，那必是自然之道。

author: Bernadette Devlin
content: Yesterday I dared to struggle. Today I dare to win.
content_cn: 昨日我敢于抗争，今日我敢于胜利。

author: Confucius
content: I will not be concerned at other men's not knowing me; I will be concerned at my own want of ability.
content_cn: 不患人之不己知，患其不能也。

author: David McCullough
content: Real success is finding your lifework in the work that you love.
content_cn: 真正的成功，是在热爱的事业中找到毕生使命。

author: Denis Waitley
content: Happiness cannot be travelled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.
content_cn: 幸福不可抵达、占有、赚取、穿戴或消费。幸福是以爱、优雅与感恩度过每分秒的心灵体验。

author: Eckhart Tolle
content: It is not uncommon for people to spend their whole life waiting to start living.
content_cn: 人们用一生等待开始生活，这并不罕见。

author: Epictetus
content: Nature gave us one tongue and two ears so we could hear twice as much as we speak.
content_cn: 自然予人一舌两耳，是为多听少言。

author: Jessamyn West
content: It is very easy to forgive others their mistakes; it takes more grit to forgive them for having witnessed your own.
content_cn: 宽恕他人之过易，原谅他人见证己失难。

author: Lucille Ball
content: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
content_cn: 先爱己，余者皆有序。欲成世间事，必先自爱。

author: Mahatma Gandhi
content: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
content_cn: 弱者永不宽恕，宽恕是强者的特质。

author: Mother Teresa
content: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.
content_cn: 若无力哺育百人，就先喂养一人。

author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.
content: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
content_cn: 爱是开启幸福之门的万能钥匙。
author_cn: 小奥利弗·温德尔·霍姆斯

author: Peter Drucker
content: Follow effective action with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
content_cn: 高效行动后需静思，静思将催生更高效行动。

author: Sun Tzu
content: You have to believe in yourself.
content_cn: 信者，成也。

author: Tony Robbins
content: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
content_cn: 成功之道在于采取大规模坚决行动。

author: Voltaire
content: We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.
content_cn: 我们从未真正活着，只是永远在期待生活。

author: William Sloane Coffin
content: Hope arouses, as nothing else can arouse, a passion for the possible.
content_cn: 希望激发的，是对可能性的热望——这是其他任何事物都无法激发的。

author: Don Miguel Ruiz
content: Be Impeccable with Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
content_cn: 慎言守诚。言必由衷。勿以言语自伤或议人是非。让言语之力指向真理与爱。

author: John F. Kennedy
content: The time to repair the roof is when the sun is shining.
content_cn: 修屋顶当趁艳阳天。

author: Diogenes
content: Wise kings generally have wise counselors; and he must be a wise man himself who is capable of distinguishing one.
content_cn: 明君常有智囊相伴；能辨智囊者，其必为智者。

author: Oprah Winfrey
content: I know that inner wisdom is more precious than wealth. The more you spend it, the more you gain.
content_cn: 我知内在智慧比财富更珍贵。愈是运用，收获愈丰。

author: Jean Cocteau
content: The extreme limit of wisdom, that's what the public calls madness.
content_cn: 智慧的极致边界，正是世人所谓的疯狂。

author: Euripides
content: Life has no blessing like a prudent friend.
content_cn: 人生至福，莫过于得一位睿智挚友。

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: I think somehow, we learn who we really are and then live with that decision.
content_cn: 我们终将认识真我，并与之共生。

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: Wherever a man may happen to turn, whatever a man may undertake, he will always end up by returning to the path which nature has marked out for him.
content_cn: 无论人转向何方，从事何事，终将回归天性指引之路。

author: John Lennon
content: Time you enjoyed wasting was not wasted.
content_cn: 你乐于消磨的时光，从不是虚度。

author: Joseph Stalin
content: I believe in one thing only, the power of human will.
content_cn: 我只相信一事：人类意志的力量。

author: Laozi
content: He who is contented is rich.
content_cn: 知足者富。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: He who lives in harmony with himself lives in harmony with the universe.
content_cn: 与己和者，与天地和。

author: Marian Wright Edelman
content: You really can change the world if you care enough.
content_cn: 若足够在意，你确能改变世界。

author: Richard Bach
content: The simplest things are often the truest.
content_cn: 至简者，往往至真。

author: Richard Bach
content: Don't turn away from possible futures before you're certain you don't have anything to learn from them.
content_cn: 未确知无可借鉴前，勿轻弃任何未来可能。

author: William Arthur Ward
content: The pessimist complains about the wind; the optimist expects it to change; the realist adjusts the sails.
content_cn: 悲观者怨风，乐观者待风转，现实者调帆。

author: Winston Churchill
content: The price of greatness is responsibility.
content_cn: 伟大之代价，即是责任。

author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
content: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
content_cn: 天才非凭极高智力或想象力，抑或二者兼有。唯爱、爱、爱，方为天才之魂。
author_cn: 沃尔夫冈·阿马德乌斯·莫扎特

author: Aeschylus
content: He who learns must suffer. And even in our sleep pain that cannot forget falls drop by drop upon the heart, and in our own despair, against our will, comes wisdom to us by the awful grace of God.
content_cn: 求知者必经苦难。纵在梦中，难忘之痛亦点滴沁心；绝望之际，智慧终将违逆我意，借神明可畏之恩典降临。

author: Isaac D'Israeli
content: The wisdom of the wise, and the experience of ages, may be preserved by quotation.
content_cn: 智者之慧与岁月经验，可借箴言永存。

author: Sammy Davis Jr.
content: You always have two choices: your commitment versus your fear.
content_cn: 你永远有两个选择：承诺，或恐惧。

author: Cicero
content: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
content_cn: 友谊令喜悦倍增，使悲痛减半，从而提升幸福，消解苦楚。

author: Kahlil Gibran
content: Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit.
content_cn: 愿友谊除深化灵魂外，别无目的。

author: A. A. Milne
content: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
content_cn: 若你活到百岁，我愿活九十九岁，如此便永不需经历没有你的日子。

author: Albert Einstein
content: A man should look for what is, and not for what he thinks should be.
content_cn: 人应探寻实然，而非臆想应然。

author: Betty Friedan
content: It is easier to live through someone else than to become complete yourself.
content_cn: 借他人而活，易；自我成就，难。

author: Cynthia Ozick
content: To want to be what one can be is purpose in life.
content_cn: 生命之意义，在于成就本可成就之自我。

author: Dalai Lama
content: Compassion and happiness are not a sign of weakness but a sign of strength.
content_cn: 慈悲与快乐非软弱之标志，实为力量之象征。

author: Epictetus
content: Difficulties are things that show a person what they are.
content_cn: 困境如镜，照见真我。

author: Epictetus
content: Practice yourself, for heaven's sake in little things, and then proceed to greater.
content_cn: 为天道故，先于小事磨砺己身，而后可图大事。

author: François de La Rochefoucauld
content: A true friend is the most precious of all possessions and the one we take the least thought about acquiring.
content_cn: 真友乃最珍贵之所有，却最不经心求得。
author_cn: 弗朗索瓦·德·拉罗什富科

author: Henri Bergson
content: Think like a man of action; act like a man of thought.
content_cn: 如行动者般思考，如思考者般行动。

author: Jawaharlal Nehru
content: A leader or a man of action in a crisis almost always acts subconsciously and then thinks of the reasons for his action.
content_cn: 危机中，领袖或行动者往往先凭潜意识行动，后才思索行动缘由。

author: John Adams
content: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.
content_cn: 耐心与毅力具有魔力，能使困难消弭、障碍遁形。

author: John Lennon
content: Yeah, we all shine on, like the moon, and the stars, and the sun.
content_cn: 是啊，我们都闪耀着，如月，如星，如日。

author: Jonas Salk
content: Intuition will tell the thinking mind where to look next.
content_cn: 直觉会指引理性思维下一步的探索方向。

author: Kahlil Gibran
content: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
content_cn: 付诸实践的少量知识，远胜束之高阁的渊博学识。

author: Laozi
content: By letting it go it all gets done. The world is won by those who let it go. But when you try and try. The world is beyond the winning.
content_cn: 无为而无所不为。不争而天下莫能与之争。强求者，反失天下。

author: Plato
content: Bodily exercise, when compulsory, does no harm to the body; but knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind.
content_cn: 被迫锻炼无伤身体，强制获得的知识却难驻心灵。

author: Richard Needham
content: Strong people make as many mistakes as weak people. Difference is that strong people admit their mistakes, laugh at them, learn from them. That is how they become strong.
content_cn: 强者与弱者犯错同样多，区别在于强者承认错误、笑对过失、从中学习——此乃强大之源。

author: Shakti Gawain
content: The more light you allow within you, the brighter the world you live in will be.
content_cn: 内心容纳的光明越多，所处的世界就越明亮。

author: Sophocles
content: Numberless are the worlds wonders, but none more wonderful than man.
content_cn: 世间奇迹不可胜数，然最奇妙者莫过于人。

author: Thomas Edison
content: Opportunity is missed by most because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
content_cn: 多数人错失机遇，因其身着工装，貌似苦差。

author: Virgil
content: Fortune favors the brave.
content_cn: 命运眷顾勇者。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Anything you really want, you can attain, if you really go after it.
content_cn: 心之所向，竭力追之，无不可得。

author: Anton Chekhov
content: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
content_cn: 知识不行诸实践，便毫无价值。

author: Ezra Taft Benson
content: With pride, there are many curses. With humility, there come many blessings.
content_cn: 骄傲招致诸多诅咒，谦逊带来无尽祝福。

author: Alexander Pope
content: Never find fault with the absent.
content_cn: 切莫背后议人是非。

author: Arthur Schopenhauer
content: In action a great heart is the chief qualification. In work, a great head.
content_cn: 行动贵在胸怀博大，工作重在头脑睿智。

author: Hal Abelson
content: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
content_cn: 程序当为人阅读而写，机器执行只是附带功能。

author: Christie Brinkley
content: Share your smile with the world. It's a symbol of friendship and peace.
content_cn: 向世界绽放你的微笑，那是友谊与和平的象征。

author: Walt Whitman
content: I have learned that to be with those I like is enough.
content_cn: 我悟得：与所爱之人相伴，便是足够。

author: Carl Sandburg
content: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
content_cn: 梦想不启，万事不生。

author: John Dewey
content: Every great advance in science has issued from a new audacity of the imagination.
content_cn: 科学的每次重大进步，皆源于想象力的崭新突破。

author: Laozi
content: He who knows that enough is enough will always have enough.
content_cn: 知足者常足。

author: Margaret Laurence
content: Know that although in the eternal scheme of things you are small, you are also unique and irreplaceable, as are all your fellow humans everywhere in the world.
content_cn: 须知在永恒秩序中你虽渺小，却独一无二不可替代，世间众生皆如是。

author: Norman Vincent Peale
content: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
content_cn: 改变思想，便能改变世界。

author: Og Mandino
content: Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity.
content_cn: 永在逆境中寻找胜利的种子。

author: Rumi
content: Something opens our wings. Something makes boredom and hurt disappear. Someone fills the cup in front of us: We taste only sacredness.
content_cn: 有物展开我们双翼，有物消解无聊与伤痛。有人斟满眼前杯盏：我们只尝到神圣滋味。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: We are Divine enough to ask and we are important enough to receive.
content_cn: 我们足够神圣故能祈求，足够重要故能获得。

author: Colin Powell
content: Avoid having your ego so close to your position that when your position falls, your ego goes with it.
content_cn: 勿让自尊与职位绑定太紧，以免职位不保时自尊同坠。

author: Francis Bacon
content: Wise men make more opportunities than they find.
content_cn: 智者创造的机会多于发现的机遇。

author: Peter Abelard
content: The key to wisdom is this - constant and frequent questioning, for by doubting we are led to question and by questioning we arrive at the truth.
content_cn: 智慧之钥在于持续频繁的质疑——怀疑引导发问，发问通向真理。

author: Julian Casablancas
content: Vanity can easily overtake wisdom. It usually overtakes common sense.
content_cn: 虚荣易超智慧，更常越常识。

author: Max Frisch
content: Technology… the knack of so arranging the world that we don't have to experience it.
content_cn: 技术……乃巧妙安排世界使我们不必亲历之诀窍。

author: Isocrates
content: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
content_cn: 缔交宜缓，既交则当坚定恒久。

author: Brooks Adams
content: One friend in a lifetime is much; two are many; three are hardly possible. Friendship needs a certain parallelism of life, a community of thought, a rivalry of aim.
content_cn: 一生得一知己足矣，得二可谓多，得三几无可能。友谊需要生命的共鸣、思想的交融、目标的辉映。

author: Oscar Wilde
content: He has no enemies, but is intensely disliked by his friends.
content_cn: 他并无敌人，却深为友人所厌。

author: Laozi
content: In dwelling, live close to the ground. In thinking, keep to the simple. In conflict, be fair and generous. In governing, don't try to control. In work, do what you enjoy. In family life, be completely present.
content_cn: 居处接地气，思虑守简朴。争端持公允，治世不妄为。工作从所好，家事尽全心。

author: Will Rogers
content: You've got to go out on a limb sometimes because that's where the fruit is.
content_cn: 有时必须冒险探枝，因硕果正在枝头。

author: Judy Garland
content: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
content_cn: 宁做一流的自己，不做二流的他人。

author: Euripides
content: Cleverness is not wisdom.
content_cn: 机巧非智慧。

author: Abraham Lincoln
content: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.
content_cn: 永志不忘：自身求胜的决心重于一切。

author: Albert Einstein
content: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
content_cn: 接受局限之日，便是超越之时。

author: Albert Einstein
content: Feeling and longing are the motive forces behind all human endeavor and human creations.
content_cn: 情感与渴望，乃人类奋斗与创造的原动力。

author: Anne Frank
content: We all live with the objective of being happy; our lives are all different and yet the same.
content_cn: 世人皆以幸福为生活目标，生命形态各异而本质相同。

author: Christopher Morley
content: There is only one success: to be able to spend your life in your own way.
content_cn: 成功唯有一种：能按自己的方式度过一生。

author: Zhuang Zhou
content: When deeds and words are in accord, the whole world is transformed.
content_cn: 言行相契，天下化之。

author: Colin Powell
content: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception; it is a prevailing attitude.
content_cn: 欲成大事之卓越，先养小节之习惯。卓越非例外，乃普遍态度。

author: Doris Mortman
content: Until you make peace with who you are, you'll never be content with what you have.
content_cn: 未与自我和解，永难对拥有知足。

author: Forrest Church
content: Do what you can. Want what you have. Be who you are.
content_cn: 尽力而为，珍惜所有，做你自己。

author: Henry Ford
content: If you think you can, you can. And if you think you can't, you're right.
content_cn: 自认可为，则必可为；自认不可为，亦是正确。

author: Laozi
content: Silence is a source of great strength.
content_cn: 静默蕴大能。

author: Laozi
content: All difficult things have their origin in that which is easy, and great things in that which is small.
content_cn: 天下难事必作于易，天下大事必作于细。

author: Lena Horne
content: Always be smarter than the people who hire you.
content_cn: 永远比雇佣你的人更聪明。

author: Oprah Winfrey
content: Although there may be tragedy in your life, there's always a possibility to triumph. It doesn't matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.
content_cn: 生命或有悲剧，但总有胜利的可能。无论出身何处，胜者之力始终源于你自己。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Most of the shadows of life are caused by standing in our own sunshine.
content_cn: 人生的阴影多是自己遮挡了阳光。

author: Richard Bach
content: The mark of your ignorance is the depth of your belief in injustice and tragedy. What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the Master calls the butterfly.
content_cn: 对不公与悲剧的深信，恰显无知之深。毛虫眼中的世界末日，大师称之为蝴蝶的诞生。

author: Rudolf Arnheim
content: All perceiving is also thinking, all reasoning is also intuition, all observation is also invention.
content_cn: 一切感知皆思考，所有推理皆直觉，全部观察即创造。

author: Sam Rayburn
content: No one has a finer command of language than the person who keeps his mouth shut.
content_cn: 沉默者最懂言语之道。

author: Sigmund Freud
content: It is impossible to escape the impression that people commonly use false standards of measurement — that they seek power, success and wealth for themselves and admire them in others, and that they underestimate what is of true value in life.
content_cn: 人们总用错误的尺度——追求权力、成功与财富，并羡慕他人拥有这些，却低估生命中真正有价值之物，这印象令人无从逃避。

author: Donald Trump
content: It is time to remember that old wisdom our soldiers will never forget: that whether we are black or brown or white, we all bleed the same red blood of patriots, we all enjoy the same glorious freedoms, and we all salute the same great American Flag.
content_cn: 是时候铭记战士们永志不忘的古老智慧：无论肤色如何，我们都流着同样的爱国热血，共享同样的光荣自由，向同一面伟大的美国国旗致敬。

author: Albert Camus
content: All men have a sweetness in their life. That is what helps them go on. It is towards that they turn when they feel too worn out.
content_cn: 人人生命中都存一丝甘甜，助其前行。精疲力竭时，便转向这甘甜。

author: Albert Camus
content: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
content_cn: 若不停追寻幸福的构成，便永不会幸福；若总寻找生命的意义，便从未真正活过。

author: Tony Robbins
content: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more
content_cn: 生命是馈赠，赋予我们特权、机遇与责任，通过自我成长回馈世界。

author: Brian Tracy
content: Whatever we expect with confidence becomes our own self-fulfilling prophecy.
content_cn: 自信期待之事，终成自我实现的预言。

author: Edward Gibbon
content: The winds and waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators.
content_cn: 风浪永远站在最出色的航海家一边。

author: Euripides
content: The wisest men follow their own direction.
content_cn: 至智者行己之路。

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
content: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
content_cn: 绳至尽头，打个结继续坚持。

author: Laozi
content: He who talks more is sooner exhausted.
content_cn: 多言数穷。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
content_cn: 幸福生活所需甚少，全在于你的思维方式。

author: Napoleon
content: If you want a thing done well, do it yourself.
content_cn: 欲成事，当亲为。

author: Rainer Maria Rilke
content: The only journey is the one within.
content_cn: 唯一真正的旅程是向内探索。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Good thoughts are no better than good dreams, unless they be executed.
content_cn: 不付诸实践的好思想，不过美梦一场。

author: Thomas Hardy
content: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change.
content_cn: 时间改变一切，唯我们内心总对变化感到惊讶的那部分永恒不变。

author: Tony Robbins
content: The way we communicate with others and with ourselves ultimately determines the quality of our lives.
content_cn: 我们与他人及自我的沟通方式，最终决定生命质量。

author: W. Clement Stone
content: When you discover your mission, you will feel its demand. It will fill you with enthusiasm and a burning desire to get to work on it.
content_cn: 发现使命时，你会感知它的召唤，充满热情与付诸实践的强烈渴望。

author: William Shakespeare
content: Be great in act, as you have been in thought.
content_cn: 行动当如思想般卓越。

author: Muhammad Ali
content: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.
content_cn: 我知前路，明真相，不必活成你期待的模样。我自由做自己。

author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
content: The older I get the more wisdom I find in the ancient rule of taking first things first. A process which often reduces the most complex human problem to a manageable proportion.
content_cn: 年岁愈长，愈觉'要事第一'古训之智。此法常使最复杂的问题化繁为简。

author: Iris Murdoch
content: Between saying and doing, many a pair of shoes is worn out.
content_cn: 从说到做，要磨破许多双鞋。

author: B. F. Skinner
author_cn: 伯尔赫斯·弗雷德里克·斯金纳
content: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
content_cn: 真正问题不在机器能否思考，而在人类是否思考。

author: Joseph Addison
content: True happiness arises, in the first place, from the enjoyment of oneself, and in the next, from the friendship and conversation of a few select companions.
content_cn: 真正的幸福，首先源于自我悦纳，其次来自三五知己的友谊与交谈。

author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
content: Our most intimate friend is not he to whom we show the worst, but the best of our nature.
content_cn: 最亲密的朋友不是看尽我们缺点之人，而是激发我们至善之人。

author: Henry Ward Beecher
content: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
content_cn: 世间无友谊与爱能及父母之爱。

author: Albert Einstein
content: When the solution is simple, God is answering.
content_cn: 答案简单时，便是天启。

author: Alexander Pope
content: Blessed is the man who expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
content_cn: 无欲者最乐，因永不失望。

author: Alfred North Whitehead
author_cn: 阿尔弗雷德·诺斯·怀特海
content: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change, and to preserve change amid order.
content_cn: 进步的艺术是在变革中保持秩序，在秩序中保持变革。

author: Blaise Pascal
content: Kind words do not cost much. Yet they accomplish much.
content_cn: 良言不费分文，却收获颇丰。

author: Brian Tracy
content: You can only grow if you're willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
content_cn: 唯有甘愿在新尝试中感受尴尬不适，方能成长。

author: Charles Dickens
content: Don't leave a stone unturned. It's always something, to know you have done the most you could.
content_cn: 翻遍每一块石头。竭尽全力本身即是成就。

author: Confucius
content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
content_cn: 不滞于步，何惧路遥。

author: Confucius
content: Fine words and an insinuating appearance are seldom associated with true virtue
content_cn: 巧言令色，鲜矣仁。

author: Confucius
content: The superior man acts before he speaks, and afterwards speaks according to his action.
content_cn: 君子先行其言，而后从之。

author: Gustave Flaubert
content: Reality does not conform to the ideal but confirms it.
content_cn: 现实不迎合理想，却印证理想。

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: Things do not change; we change.
content_cn: 万物未变，是我们变了。

author: John Dryden
content: A thing well said will be wit in all languages.
content_cn: 妙语在任何语言中都显智慧。

author: Lucille Ball
content: I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
content_cn: 我的日常信仰很简单：先爱自己，其余自会各得其所。

author: Paul Tillich
content: Decision is a risk rooted in the courage of being free.
content_cn: 抉择是植根于自由勇气的冒险。

author: Plutarch
content: To make no mistakes is not in the power of man; but from their errors and mistakes the wise and good learn wisdom for the future.
content_cn: 人非圣贤孰能无过，智者善从过失中汲取未来之智。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you.
content_cn: 尽力成为最好的自己，因你仅此一生。

author: Robert Fulghum
content: Peace is not something you wish for. It's something you make, something you do, something you are, and something you give away.
content_cn: 和平非祈愿可得。它是你的创造、行动、本质与馈赠。

author: Tony Robbins
content: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
content_cn: 我们能改变人生，成为并拥有心之所向。

author: Leo Buscaglia
content: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
content_cn: 天赋是上帝的馈赠，如何运用则是你给上帝的礼物。

author: Isocrates
content: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.
content_cn: 当意识到对生命、自我与世界的认知何其有限时，真智慧便降临了。

author: Aldous Huxley
content: Technological progress has merely provided us with more efficient means for going backwards.
content_cn: 科技进步只是为我们提供了更高效的倒退手段。

author: Joseph Campbell
content: Love is a friendship set to music.
content_cn: 爱情是谱上乐曲的友谊。

author: Woody Allen
content: Interestingly, according to modern astronomers, space is finite. This is a very comforting thought-- particularly for people who can never remember where they have left things.
content_cn: 有趣的是，现代天文学家认为宇宙有限。这个想法非常令人安慰——尤其对那些总记不住东西放哪儿的人。

author: Abraham Maslow
content: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself.
content_cn: 改变一个人的关键在于改变其自我认知。

author: Albert Einstein
content: Peace cannot be kept by force. It can only be achieved by understanding.
content_cn: 和平无法靠武力维持，只能通过理解实现。

author: Albert Einstein
content: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
content_cn: 若无法简单解释，说明理解不够透彻。

author: Ben Stein
content: The first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
content_cn: 获取人生所求的第一步是：明确你想要什么。

author: The Buddha
content: To have much learning and skill, to be well-trained in discipline, and good in speech — this is the highest blessing.
content_cn: 博学多能、严于律己、善于言辞——此乃无上福祉。

author: The Buddha
content: A single lamp may light hundreds of thousands of lamps without itself being diminished.
content_cn: 一灯可点亮千万灯，而自身光芒不减。

author: Coco Chanel
content: How many cares one loses when one decides not to be something but to be someone.
content_cn: 当决定不做'某类人'而要做'自己'时，多少烦恼随之消散。

author: Douglas Adams
content: Human beings, who are almost unique in having the ability to learn from the experience of others, are also remarkable for their apparent disinclination to do so.
content_cn: 人类几乎独有从他人经验学习的能力，却同样以明显不愿这么做而著称。

author: Herbert Bayard Swope
content: I cannot give you the formula for success, but I can give you the formula for failure: which is: Try to please everybody.
content_cn: 我无法给你成功的公式，但能给你失败的公式：试图取悦所有人。

author: Jean de La Fontaine
content: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
content_cn: 悲伤乘着时间的翅膀飞逝。

author: Laurence J. Peter
content: There are two kinds of failures: those who thought and never did, and those who did and never thought.
content_cn: 失败者有两种：只想不做者，只做不想者。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Do not be too timid and squeamish about your reactions. All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
content_cn: 不必对自身反应太过胆怯挑剔。人生本就是实验，尝试越多越好。

author: Robert F. Kennedy
content: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
content_cn: 唯有敢于惨败之人，方能取得伟大成就。

author: Simone de Beauvoir
content: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
content_cn: 今日即改人生。莫赌未来，此刻行动，刻不容缓。

author: Susan B. Anthony
content: Independence is happiness.
content_cn: 独立即是幸福。

author: Thomas Aquinas
content: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
content_cn: 世间无物比真挚友谊更珍贵。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
content_cn: 思想决定境遇，欲改人生，先拓思维。

author: Stephen Hawking
content: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
content_cn: 仰望星空而非俯视双脚。尝试理解所见，思索宇宙起源。永葆好奇。

author: Masayoshi Son
content: People usually compare the computer to the head of the human being. I would say that hardware is the bone of the head, the skull. The semiconductor is the brain within the head. The software is the wisdom. And data is the knowledge.
content_cn: 人们常将计算机比作人脑。我认为硬件是头骨，半导体是颅内之脑，软件乃智慧，数据即知识。

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: The doors of wisdom are never shut.
content_cn: 智慧之门永不关闭。

author: Simon Sinek
content: The strong bond of friendship is not always a balanced equation; friendship is not always about giving and taking in equal shares. Instead, friendship is grounded in a feeling that you know exactly who will be there for you when you need something, no matter what or when.
content_cn: 牢固友谊不总是对等关系，不在于付出与收获均等，而在于确信无论何时需要，总有人会为你而来。

author: Jean de La Fontaine
content: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
content_cn: 真爱已稀，真友谊更罕。

author: Alan Cohen
content: Appreciation is the highest form of prayer, for it acknowledges the presence of good wherever you shine the light of your thankful thoughts.
content_cn: 感恩是祈祷的最高形式，因它在你感恩之光照耀处，总能看到善的存在。

author: Ambrose Bierce
content: Speak when you are angry, and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
content_cn: 愤怒时的发言，必成你最精彩的悔恨。

author: Carl Jung
content: It all depends on how we look at things, and not how they are in themselves.
content_cn: 一切取决于我们如何看待事物，而非事物本身如何。

author: Dalai Lama
content: Happiness does not come about only due to external circumstances; it mainly derives from inner attitudes.
content_cn: 幸福不只源于外部环境，主要来自内心态度。

author: Doug Horton
content: Be your own hero, it's cheaper than a movie ticket.
content_cn: 做自己的英雄，这比电影票便宜多了。

author: George S. Patton
content: If a man does his best, what else is there?
content_cn: 人若已尽全力，夫复何求？

author: Henry David Thoreau
content: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
content_cn: 重要的不是你看什么，而是你看见什么。

author: Kin Hubbard
content: You won't skid if you stay in a rut.
content_cn: 固守陈规便不会失足。

author: Laozi
content: Doing nothing is better than being busy doing nothing.
content_cn: 无为胜于忙而无功。

author: Laozi
content: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
content_cn: 大事必作于细。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: All achievements, all earned riches, have their beginning in an idea.
content_cn: 所有成就与财富，皆始于一个念头。

author: Oscar Wilde
content: Anybody can make history. Only a great man can write it.
content_cn: 人人都能创造历史，唯伟人能书写历史。

author: Plotinus
content: Knowledge has three degrees: opinion, science, illumination. The means or instrument of the first is sense; of the second, dialectic; of the third, intuition.
content_cn: 知识有三重境界：见解、科学、启示。第一重凭感官，第二重靠辩证，第三重借直觉。

author: Richard Bach
content: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
content_cn: 毛虫眼中的世界末日，大师称之为蝴蝶的诞生。

author: Walter Lippmann
content: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf.
content_cn: 理解智慧需要智慧：若听众耳聋，音乐便毫无意义。

author: William Cowper
content: Knowledge is proud that it knows so much; wisdom is humble that it knows no more.
content_cn: 知识因渊博而骄傲，智慧因自知不足而谦逊。

author: Vernor Vinge
content: So much technology, so little talent.
content_cn: 技术如此之多，才能如此之少。

author: Harbhajan Singh
content: I define friendship as a bond that transcends all barriers. When you are ready to expect anything and everything from friends, good, bad or ugly... that's what I call true friendship.
content_cn: 我定义的友谊是超越一切障碍的纽带。当你准备好接受朋友的一切，无论美好、糟糕或不堪…这才是真正的友谊。

author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
content_cn: 婚姻不幸非因缺少爱情，而是缺乏友谊。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: A man's growth is seen in the successive choirs of his friends
content_cn: 一个人的成长，可见于他更迭的朋友圈。

author: Chanakya
content: Never make friends with people who are above or below you in status. Such friendships will never give you any happiness.
content_cn: 勿与地位悬殊者为友，此类友谊永不带来快乐。

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: Be slow in choosing a friend, slower in changing.
content_cn: 择友宜缓，断交更需谨慎。

author: Eustace Budgell
content: Friendship is a strong and habitual inclination in two persons to promote the good and happiness of one another.
content_cn: 友谊是两人之间促进彼此美德与幸福的强烈而持久的意愿。

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
author_cn: 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森
content: Marriage: A friendship recognized by the police.
content_cn: 婚姻：警方认可的特殊友谊。

author: Henry James
content: Three things in human life are important. The first is to be kind. The second is to be kind. The third is to be kind.
content_cn: 人生三事至关重要：一曰仁慈，二曰仁慈，三曰仁慈。

author: Marie Curie
content: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
content_cn: 少些对人心的好奇，多些对思想的探索。

author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
content: Happiness is as a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but which if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
content_cn: 幸福如蝶，追逐时总难企及，静坐时却可能翩然落肩。

author: Thomas Carlyle
content: By nature, man hates change; seldom will he quit his old home till it has actually fallen around his ears.
content_cn: 人性厌恶改变，不到老宅倾颓，绝不轻离。

author: Thomas Dewar
content: Minds are like parachutes. They only function when open.
content_cn: 思想如降落伞，打开时才有用。

author: Voltaire
content: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
content_cn: 冥想是思想消融于永恒觉知中的过程，是无需客体化的纯粹意识，是不假思索的觉照，是有限融入无限。

author: Walter Cronkite
content: I can't imagine a person becoming a success who doesn't give this game of life everything he's got.
content_cn: 无法想象不全情投入生命游戏之人能获成功。

author: Zig Ziglar
content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
content_cn: 达成目标所得，不如达成目标所成之人重要。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
content_cn: 遵循自然的节奏：她的秘诀是耐心。

author: Isocrates
content: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
content_cn: 唯一真正的智慧是知道自己一无所知。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Nature and books belong to the eyes that see them.
content_cn: 自然与书籍属于能看见它们的眼睛。

author: John F. Kennedy
content: When written in Chinese, the word 'crisis' is composed of two characters. One represents danger and the other represents opportunity.
content_cn: 中文的'危机'由两字组成：一为'危'，一为'机'。

author: Martin Luther King Jr.
content: Science investigates; religion interprets. Science gives man knowledge which is power; religion gives man wisdom which is control.
content_cn: 科学探索，宗教诠释。科学赋予人力量的知识，宗教赋予人克制的智慧。

author: John Wooden
content: Be true to yourself, help others, make each day your masterpiece, make friendship a fine art, drink deeply from good books - especially the Bible, build a shelter against a rainy day, give thanks for your blessings and pray for guidance every day.
content_cn: 忠于自我，助人为乐，日日如杰作，友谊成艺术，饱读好书——尤以圣经为甚，未雨绸缪，感恩福泽，每日祈请指引。

author: Jim Morrison
content: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
content_cn: 朋友是给你全然做自己自由的人。

author: Plutarch
content: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
content_cn: 我不需要随我改变而改变、随我点头而点头的朋友，我的影子做得更好。

author: Audre Lorde
content: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
content_cn: 当我敢于强大，用力量践行愿景时，恐惧与否便越来越不重要。

author: Bruce Lee
content: Take no thought of who is right or wrong or who is better than. Be not for or against.
content_cn: 不思谁对谁错孰优孰劣，不持立场。

author: Confucius
content: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
content_cn: 己所不欲，勿施于人。

author: Confucius
content: When you see a man of worth, think of how you may emulate him. When you see one who is unworthy, examine yourself.
content_cn: 见贤思齐焉，见不贤而内自省也。

author: Dale Carnegie
content: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
content_cn: 世上多数重要之事，都是由看似无望时仍坚持尝试的人完成的。

author: David Brinkley
content: A successful person is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks that others throw at him or her.
content_cn: 成功者能用别人砸向自己的砖块筑就坚实基础。

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
content_cn: 你必须去做自以为做不到的事。

author: Bruce Lee
content: To hell with circumstances, I create opportunities.
content_cn: 去他的环境，我自创机遇。

author: Daisaku Ikeda
content: True happiness means forging a strong spirit that is undefeated, no matter how trying our circumstances.
content_cn: 真正的幸福是锻造百折不挠的强韧灵魂，无论境遇多艰。

author: Dale Carnegie
content: When fate hands us a lemon, let's try to make lemonade.
content_cn: 当命运给柠檬，就试着做柠檬汁。

author: E. M. Forster
content: One must be fond of people and trust them if one is not to make a mess of life.
content_cn: 若要人生不混乱，须爱人且信人。

author: Edmund Burke
content: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
content_cn: 因只能做少许事而什么都不做，此乃最大错误。

author: Harriet Beecher Stowe
content: All serious daring starts from within.
content_cn: 一切真正的勇敢皆源于内心。

author: Henry J. Kaiser
content: Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.
content_cn: 困难只是穿着工作服的机遇。

author: Jean-Paul Sartre
content: Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
content_cn: 自由是你如何对待发生在你身上的事。

author: John Lennon
content: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
content_cn: 爱是必须任其生长的花朵。

author: John Ruskin
content: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort.
content_cn: 品质绝非偶然，总是智慧努力的结果。

author: Kathleen Norris
content: All that is necessary is to accept the impossible, do without the indispensable, and bear the intolerable.
content_cn: 必要之事无非是接受不可能、舍弃不可或缺、忍受不可忍受。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Everything that exists is in a manner the seed of that which will be.
content_cn: 现存万物皆可谓未来之种的某种形式。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
content_cn: 莫再争论好人标准，直接成为好人。

author: Mother Teresa
content: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
content_cn: 我们永远无法尽知一个简单微笑能带来多少美好。

author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
content: Fear not for the future, weep not for the past.
content_cn: 不惧未来，不泣过往。

author: Richard Bach
content: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
content_cn: 为美好时刻付费的最佳方式就是享受它。

author: Robert M. Pirsig
content: The only Zen you find on the tops of mountains is the Zen you bring up there.
content_cn: 山顶寻得的禅，不过是你带上去的禅。

author: Rumi
content: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
content_cn: 每个人生来都有特定使命，每颗心都怀有对此使命的渴望。

author: Samuel Johnson
content: Memory is the mother of all wisdom.
content_cn: 记忆乃一切智慧之母。

author: Sun Tzu
content: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?
content_cn: 若能尽我所能，你可知我将有何作为？

author: Victor Hugo
content: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
content_cn: 生命是花，爱是蜜。

author: Winston Churchill
content: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
content_cn: 起立发言需要勇气，坐下倾听同样需要勇气。

author: Winston Churchill
content: Never, never, never give up.
content_cn: 永不，永不，永不放弃。

author: Pope John XXIII
content: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
content_cn: 勿问恐惧，问希望与梦想；莫思挫折，思未展之潜能；不纠结尝试过的失败，关注仍可为之可能。

author: Epictetus
content: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
content_cn: 关键只与提升你、能激发你最好一面的人为伍。

author: John Wooden
content: It's the little details that are vital. Little things make big things happen.
content_cn: 微小细节至关重要，小事成就大事。

author: Lewis Carroll
content: If you don't know where you are going, any road will get you there.
content_cn: 若不知去向，条条道路皆可达。

author: Ravi Zacharias
content: You can only learn so much from books. You can only learn so much from education. Ultimately, it is the wisdom of God that will carry you through in the toughest situations of life.
content_cn: 书本所学终有限，教育所获亦有涯。最终，是神的智慧助你度过人生至暗时刻。

author: Augustine of Hippo
content: Habit, if not resisted, soon becomes necessity.
content_cn: 习惯若不抵抗，很快会变成必需。

author: Confucius
content: A youth, when at home, should be filial and, abroad, respectful to his elders. He should be earnest and truthful. He should overflow in love to all and cultivate the friendship of the good. When he has time and opportunity, after the performance of these things, he should employ them in polite studies.
content_cn: 弟子入则孝，出则悌，谨而信，泛爱众，而亲仁。行有余力，则以学文。

author: François de La Rochefoucauld
content: However rare true love may be, it is less so than true friendship.
content_cn: 真爱虽稀，真友谊更罕。

author: Charles Caleb Colton
content: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.
content_cn: 真友谊如健康，失去方知其珍贵。

author: Johann Kaspar Lavater
content: Neatness begets order; but from order to taste there is the same difference as from taste to genius, or from love to friendship.
content_cn: 整洁生秩序，秩序到品味的距离，如同品味到天才、爱情到友谊的距离。

author: Aristotle
content: Those that know, do. Those that understand, teach.
content_cn: 知者行之，明者教之。

author: Barbara De Angelis
content: We need to find the courage to say NO to the things and people that are not serving us if we want to rediscover ourselves and live our lives with authenticity.
content_cn: 若要重拾真我，活出本真，就要勇敢对无益之事与之人说不。

author: Blaise Pascal
content: We must learn our limits. We are all something, but none of us are everything.
content_cn: 必须认清局限：我们各有所长，但无人无所不能。

author: Confucius
content: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
content_cn: 择汝所爱，终生不劳。

author: Confucius
content: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
content_cn: 欲持恒福慧，须常变通。

author: Frank Lloyd Wright
content: Respect should be earned by actions, and not acquired by years.
content_cn: 尊重当以行赢取，非以年岁累积。

author: Harold Nicolson
content: We are all inclined to judge ourselves by our ideals; others, by their acts.
content_cn: 人皆惯以理想衡己，以行为量人。

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
content: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
content_cn: 纠错有力，鼓励更甚。

author: John Eliot
content: All the great performers I have worked with are fueled by a personal dream.
content_cn: 与我共事的杰出者，皆以个人梦想为动力。

author: Kahlil Gibran
content: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
content_cn: 美不在容颜，而在心光。

author: Lou Holtz
content: You were not born a winner, and you were not born a loser. You are what you make yourself be.
content_cn: 生而非胜者，亦非败者，汝乃自塑之人。

author: Niels Bohr
content: How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress.
content_cn: 遇悖论实乃妙事，进步之机现焉。

author: Plutarch
content: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
content_cn: 内在成就将改变外在现实。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Our strength grows out of our weaknesses.
content_cn: 力量从弱点中生长。

author: Richard Bach
content: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
content_cn: 千里岂真隔知己...若心系所爱，身岂非已在？

author: Seneca the Younger
content: Things that were hard to bear are sweet to remember.
content_cn: 昔日难忍之事，今朝回味尤甘。

author: Sun Tzu
content: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
content_cn: 不战而屈人之兵，善之善者也。

author: Thomas Paine
content: The most formidable weapon against errors of every kind is reason.
content_cn: 理性乃对抗万谬之利器。

author: Tony Robbins
content: When people are like each other they tend to like each other.
content_cn: 相似之人易相悦。

author: Winston Churchill
content: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
content_cn: 有敌人？甚好。这说明你曾为某事挺身。

author: Thomas Edison
content: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are: Hard work, Stick-to-itiveness, and Common sense.
content_cn: 成事三要素：勤奋、坚持、常识。

author: Sophocles
content: If you were to offer a thirsty man all wisdom, you would not please him more than if you gave him a drink.
content_cn: 予渴者万智，不如予一饮。

author: Cicero
content: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
content_cn: 爱是受美启迪而缔结友谊的尝试。

author: Hubert Humphrey
content: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
content_cn: 至愈良方，唯友谊与爱。

author: Benjamin Franklin
content: Well done is better than well said.
content_cn: 行胜于言。

author: Desmond Tutu
content: We must not allow ourselves to become like the system we oppose.
content_cn: 切莫活成自己反对的模样。

author: Dalai Lama
content: The key to transforming our hearts and minds is to have an understanding of how our thoughts and emotions work.
content_cn: 转变心性的关键，在于理解思维与情绪的运作。

author: Dhammapada
content: Do not give your attention to what others do or fail to do; give it to what you do or fail to do.
content_cn: 莫关注他人行止，当专注己身作为。

author: Eleanor Roosevelt
content: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.
content_cn: 诚勇面对生活，经验促人成长，品格由此铸就。

author: Epictetus
content: If you wish to be a writer, write.
content_cn: 欲为作家，提笔便是。

author: Epictetus
content: Not every difficult and dangerous thing is suitable for training, but only that which is conducive to success in achieving the object of our effort.
content_cn: 非所有艰险皆宜历练，唯助达目标者可为。

author: Ernest Hemingway
content: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
content_cn: 人非为败而生，可毁不可败。

author: Helen Keller
content: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
content_cn: 品格非安逸中所能养成，唯经试炼与苦难，灵魂方强，视野方清，壮志方燃，成功方至。

author: Indira Gandhi
content: You can't shake hands with a clenched fist.
content_cn: 握拳难握手。

author: John Astin
content: There are things so deep and complex that only intuition can reach it in our stage of development as human beings.
content_cn: 有些事物深邃复杂，以人类现阶段发展，唯直觉可及。

author: Jon Kabat-Zinn
content: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
content_cn: 浪不可止，但可学冲浪。

author: Laozi
content: If you correct your mind, the rest of your life will fall into place.
content_cn: 正其心，则万事皆顺。

author: Lauren Bacall
content: Imagination is the highest kite one can fly.
content_cn: 想象是能放飞的最高风筝。

author: Marie Curie
content: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.
content_cn: 从不看已成就，只看待完成。

author: Mary Kay Ash
content: Those who are blessed with the most talent don't necessarily outperform everyone else. It's the people with follow-through who excel.
content_cn: 天赋异禀者未必出众，善始善终者方卓越。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: No man can succeed in a line of endeavor which he does not like.
content_cn: 人不爱其业，则业不成。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Here is one quality that one must possess to win, and that is definiteness of purpose, the knowledge of what one wants, and a burning desire to possess it.
content_cn: 制胜必备品质：目标明确，知己所求，怀拥炽愿。

author: Nikos Kazantzakis
content: By believing passionately in something that does not yet exist, we create it.
content_cn: 热信未存之物，我们便创造它。

author: Richard Bach
content: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.
content_cn: 我择之而改变生命的真义：克服恐惧，见证奇迹。

author: Sam Levenson
content: It's so simple to be wise. Just think of something stupid to say and then don't say it.
content_cn: 明智很简单：想出蠢话，然后闭嘴。

author: Vince Lombardi
content: Leaders aren't born they are made. And they are made just like anything else, through hard work. And that's the price we'll have to pay to achieve that goal, or any goal.
content_cn: 领袖非天生，乃后天造就。如万物般，靠勤奋炼成。这是达成任何目标必须付出的代价。

author: Wayne Dyer
content: Everything you are against weakens you. Everything you are for empowers you.
content_cn: 反对的一切削弱你，支持的一切赋能你。

author: William Arthur Ward
content: Do more than dream: work.
content_cn: 不仅做梦，更要实干。

author: Cicero
content: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.
content_cn: 智慧之功在于明辨善恶。

author: Franz Grillparzer
content: Genius unrefined resembles a flash of lightning, but wisdom is like the sun.
content_cn: 未经锤炼的天才如闪电，智慧则似太阳。

author: Lou Holtz
content: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
content_cn: 能力是你能做什么，动力决定你做什么，态度决定你做得如何。

author: Louise Hay
content: The thoughts we choose to think are the tools we use to paint the canvas of our lives.
content_cn: 我们选择的思绪，是绘制人生画卷的画笔。

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
content_cn: 每次逆境、失败与心痛，都藏着同等或更大益处的种子。

author: Richard Bach
content: Strong beliefs win strong men, and then make them stronger.
content_cn: 坚定信念赢得强者，继而使其更强。

author: Thomas Jefferson
content: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
content_cn: 欲知你是谁？莫问，行动！行动将勾勒并定义你。

author: Molière
content: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
content_cn: 智者超然于一切侮辱，对无礼之举的最佳回应是耐心与节制。

author: Albert Schweitzer
content: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
content_cn: 行美好之事，人必效之。

author: Benjamin Haydon
content: There surely is in human nature an inherent propensity to extract all the good out of all the evil.
content_cn: 人性确有从一切恶中提取善的天性。

author: Bruce Lee
content: As you think, so shall you become.
content_cn: 思其所是，成其所思。

author: Daisaku Ikeda
content: Genuine sincerity opens people's hearts, while manipulation causes them to close.
content_cn: 至诚启人心扉，算计令人心闭。

author: Richard Bach
content: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back, they're yours; if they don't, they never were.
content_cn: 爱一个人就放手。若其归来，便是你的；若不归来，本不属于你。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
content_cn: 无热忱，无伟业。

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
content: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
content_cn: 莫循现成路，要闯无人径，留痕身后。

author: Rabbi Hillel
content: If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am not for others, what am I? And if not now, when?
content_cn: 我不为己，谁为我？我不为人，我是谁？此时不为，更待何时？

author: Napoleon Hill
content: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
content_cn: 莫等待，永无恰当时。

author: Marcus Aurelius
content: Each day provides its own gifts.
content_cn: 每日皆有馈赠。

author: Liberace
content: Nobody will believe in you unless you believe in yourself.
content_cn: 人不自信，谁人信之。

author: Leonardo da Vinci
content: Who sows virtue reaps honor.
content_cn: 种德者收誉。

author: Jonathan Kozol
content: Pick battles big enough to matter, small enough to win.
content_cn: 择战事：大至重要，小可取胜。

author: George Eliot
content: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
content_cn: 成为本可能成为的人，永不为晚。

author: Barack Obama
content: Focusing your life solely on making a buck shows a poverty of ambition. It asks too little of yourself. And it will leave you unfulfilled.
content_cn: 一生只求赚钱是抱负的贫瘠，是对自我的低估，终将令你空虚。

author: Anna Pavlova
content: To follow, without halt, one aim: There is the secret of success.
content_cn: 成功秘诀：坚定不移追求一个目标。

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
author_cn: 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森
content: There is no duty we so underrate as the duty of being happy. By being happy we sow anonymous benefits upon the world.
content_cn: 我们最低估的义务是保持快乐的义务。快乐时，我们就在世间播撒无名的福祉。

author: Vernon Cooper
content: These days people seek knowledge, not wisdom. Knowledge is of the past; wisdom is of the future.
content_cn: 当今人们求知识而非智慧。知识属于过去，智慧属于未来。

author: William Lyon Phelps
content: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.
content_cn: 对绅士的最终考验：尊重对其毫无价值之人。

author: William C. Menninger
content: Six essential qualities that are the key to success: Sincerity, personal integrity, humility, courtesy, wisdom, charity.
content_cn: 成功六要素：真诚、正直、谦逊、礼貌、智慧、仁慈。

author: Winston Churchill
content: Short words are best and the old words when short are best of all.
content_cn: 短词最佳，古老的短词尤妙。

author: Dale Carnegie
content: Applause is a receipt, not a bill.
content_cn: 掌声是收据，非账单。

author: Harvey Mackay
content: Talent is God-given; be humble. Fame is man-given; be thankful. Conceit is self-given; be careful.
content_cn: 天赋神赐，当谦卑；名声人予，当感恩；自负己授，当谨慎。

author: Amelia Earhart
content: Never interrupt someone doing what you said couldn't be done.
content_cn: 勿扰正做你口中不可为之事的人。

author: Dale Turner
content: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
content_cn: 最佳教训常来自过往错误。昔日之误，乃未来之智与成。

author: Joyce Meyer
content: Many sophisticated, intelligent people lack wisdom and common sense.
content_cn: 许多世故聪明之人缺乏智慧与常识。

author: Mariella Frostrup
author_cn: 玛丽埃拉·弗罗斯特鲁普
content: Every friendship goes through ups and downs. Dysfunctional patterns set in; external situations cause internal friction; you grow apart and then bounce back together.
content_cn: 每段友谊都有起伏。失调模式产生，外部环境引发内部摩擦，你们疏远又复合。

author: Samuel Johnson
content: Friendship, like love, is destroyed by long absence, though it may be increased by short intermissions.
content_cn: 友谊如爱情，久别则毁，小别反增。

author: Albert Camus
content: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that there was within me an invincible summer.
content_cn: 严冬深处，我终悟心中有不败盛夏。
